title: Truebill Budget Planner, Bill Tracker and Reminder
description:
TRACK EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
Truebill, the most convenient and big picture personal finance tracker, budget planner and bill reminder app.

Bill tracker app, Truebill’s user friendly interface lets you seamlessly track everything from expenses & spending to upcoming bills  - all while putting money back into your pocket! The budget planner and bill reminder keep track so you don’t have to.  

OVER A MILLION USERS TRUST TRUEBILL?
◉ NBC: This Startup Is Helping People Find Forgotten Money

◉ CNN: How To Shave Hundreds Off Your Credit Card Bill

◉ Fortune: There’s Now A Startup To Help You Cancel All Those Subscriptions

◉ TechCrunch: Truebill Wants To Help You Manage Your Online Subscriptions

◉ Chicago Tribune: 15-Minute Fixes For Your Family’s Finances

THE BUDGET PLANNER AND BILL REMINDER
Truebill, a budget planner and bill reminder app, evaluates your financial standing holistically, giving you a personal finance tracker & bill tracker app that balances automation and customization to make money saving as easy as possible.

Truebill is free to use and offers a wide array of tools all on one simple platform. Save money by managing your subscriptions and bills. Truebill, monthly bill organizer, will automatically detect and manage subscriptions, helping you to keep track of everything --even the ones you may have forgotten about! 

Truebill is a budget planner and bill reminder you can trust!

 THE BILL TRACKER THAT ACTUALLY HELPS YOU SAVE MONEY
Log-in to easily view your monthly bill organizer to stay on top of subscriptions, enjoy easy cancellation and bill negotiations handled by Truebill on your behalf. Having a personal finance tracker in your pocket to manage bills will put an end to late fees and overdraft charges.

Join the thousands using Truebill, expense tracker & spending tracker app to feel confident and in control of your finances. Users see savings of $512 per year by using the budget planner to track spending, manage subscriptions & lower bills. You can even receive credits for things like internet outages - automatically by using this simple expense tracker and spending tracker app.

Examples of how Truebill will save money automatically:

✓ Negotiating the best rates on cable, internet, and cell phone bills
✓ Getting you credits for service outages you may not even know about
✓ Manage subscriptions, cancel unwanted subscriptions, and keep track of recurring bills
✓ Track and manage bills with our monthly bill organizer
✓ Get bank fees refunded, automatically

 MANAGE BILLS & SUBSCRIPTIONS TOGETHER
Bill tracker app, Truebill, is easy to use and your next step towards taking back time and money lost on managing subscriptions, tracking expenses, spending, and budget planning. Truebill expense tracker is your free personal financial tracker and the only app designed to put money back into your pocket.

Truebill is an intuitive monthly bill organizer & bill tracker app created to save money automatically. Our proactive spending tracker & expense tracker tool highlights trends and subscriptions, keeping you in the loop with alerts from the budget planner.

Download our amazing spending tracker &  bill tracker app today and enjoy the best personal finance tracker in the play store!

By downloading and using Truebill, you agree to our current Terms of Use (truebill.com/terms) and Privacy Policy (truebill.com/privacy).

recentChanges: We've added a bills toggle to your spending tab so you can see your spending pie chart without bills (which often eat up too much of the pie!). We've also fixed some bugs.
comments: Amazing! This app helps me better my spending habit with little to no effort. Its not amazing at automatically categorizing your purchases but pretty good. The app automatically sets a budget for each category on an average of your spending for that category but you can lower or raise them if u want. It will notify u when your getting close to your budget limit. Splendid!
Excellent app. Helps to show how I can save more and renegotiates bills with companies like cable to lower your bill. So you don't have to renegotiate it yourself.
For someone using this app for about 2 weeks now, I think this is amazing to see were your money is going the most which can help you plan better and save more. Great job Truebill
Failure to receive code. Despite many attempts to receive the message that's supposed to be sent to my number, none have succeeded. I assure that the correct information is being put in.
Having the same issue as others have posted before. Oneplus 7 pro. Formatting issues. Text cut off. Words missing. Letters cut off.

title: Armstrong Bank
description:
The Armstrong Bank App is a free mobile decision-support tool that gives you the ability to aggregate all of your financial accounts, including accounts from other financial institutions, into a single, up-to-the-minute view so you can stay organized and make smarter financial decisions. It is fast, secure and makes life easier by empowering you with the tools you need to manage your personal finances.


FEATURES
Multi-Account Aggregation: View all of your financial information (balances, transaction history, merchant spending averages) in one place for on-the-go organization.

Alerts & Notifications: Set alerts for low funds and be notified about upcoming bills.

Add Tags, Notes, Images & Geo-Information: By enhancing transactions with custom tags, notes or photos of a receipt or check, you have the ability to stay organized and find exactly what you’re looking for when searching through your finances.

Contact: Locate ATMs or branches and contact Armstrong Bank customer service directly from the app.


SAFE AND SECURE
The app utilizes the same bank-level security that protects you when you’re on Internet Banking. The app also features a unique 4-digit passcode setting that prevents unauthorized access.


GETTING STARTED
To use the Armstrong Bank App, you must be enrolled as an Armstrong Bank Internet Banking user. If you currently use our Internet Banking, simply download the app, launch it, and login with the same Internet Banking credentials. After you successfully login to the app, your accounts and transactions will begin updating.

comments: Updated the app & now it keeps kicking me out. Now I've used too many attempts to log in.
Not completely up to date. Not completely accurate. Sometimes it takes time to simply load.
Absolutely love this app and the bank in general!
Very secure and easy to use.

I cant even use this app on my cell phone. cant log in and get caught in an endless loop. I like using it if I could only log in. update to 4 stars: I depend on being able to use this app. to check my balance went into the bank and was helped with logging in. thank you. but I still don't like the having to log in with 4 different steps.

title: BofA Prepaid Mobile
description:
With the BofA Prepaid app, you can easily access your BofA Prepaid accounts anytime anywhere all from your phone! You must have received a BofA Prepaid card from an employer, government agency or company with whom you do business prior to using the BofA Prepaid app.* 
This application is free to download and makes it easy for you to manage your Prepaid accounts on the go!
 FEATURES 
Once you've created a passcode for logging on, you'll have access to:
* View Prepaid Card balances
* View Prepaid Card transaction history
* ATM Locator
* Suspend or reactivate Prepaid Cards
* Manage alerts
 MOBILE SECURITY
Your security is our priority. Mobile data transmissions and account information are protected by the same highly secure SSL Standards, just like they are when you access your Prepaid accounts online. Experience the freedom of mobile account access at the palm of your hands!
 For questions about the BofA Prepaid app, please contact us by calling 844.511.1331 or emailing mobileservices@prepaidcard.bankofamerica.com 
 *This is not the Bank of America Mobile Banking app, which allows you to access your Bank of America, N.A. bank and Merrill Lynch brokerage accounts.
 
Terms and Conditions: https://prepaid.bankofamerica.com/content/PRC384/_Docs/DIGITAL-BofAPrepaid-Terms.pdf 	

Privacy Notice: https://prepaid.bankofamerica.com/content/PRC384/_Docs/DIGITAL-BofAPrepaid-Privacy.pdf   
 
Bank of America N.A. Member FDIC
© 2020 Bank of America Corporation

recentChanges: ​Patch to fix biometrics and Quick Access issues
comments: Unable to log in, keeps having error. Logged in on a computer to make sure that my information was correct and had no problem. Unless this is resolved I will not be able to use this app as much as I would like to be able to. I have seen it work on a friend's phone without issues, not sure why I (like many others here) am unable to log in.

This app is very simple and intuitive in its format but many things are full of glitches and it is very limited in what it offers. I cannot figure out how to transfer my funds to a different bank account. I have a prepaid card for plasma donation at Grifols and they used to use Wirecard before they switched to BoA. I preferred Wirecard infinitely more.

Be PATIENT! The "fingerprint" login WORKS just fine. When you get the "fingerprint recognized" message - if you wait just a moment - you will be rewarded with your account balance and other click-able settings & information. Believe me, please... The biometric login WORKS!

App works as it should. Quick to update transactions. The only downfall (which isn't a huge deal) is the fingerprint access doesn't work. I set it up, it recognizes fingerprint, but when I go to log in the next time it doesn't work. All my other banking apps have no issue.

Worst banking app. From day one months ago I made a account. Have never been able to log in. Ive try many of times to reset password never ever ever has it emailed me any type of link with a code to do so. Never. Huge pain in the ass have to call every time. And at the least why cant i just send a txt to see balance so i dont have to even bother with the app.

title: Credit Sesame-Personalized Credit Score Tips
description:
Biggest Update to take your credit to the next level!
IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS of your credit score with interactive graphs
NEW PERSONALIZED INSIGHTS: bite-size actions you can take now  
INTUITIVE CATEGORIZATION of recommendations based on your approval odds.

Get your free credit score, report card and monitoring with Credit Sesame.  Our mission is to empower you to achieve your financial goals. With our credit score app we provide millions of people access to free credit scores and coach you to grow your financial potential. No credit card is required, and checking your score will not impact it.  Start the journey today to improve your credit score.


Here is what you can expect in addition to your monthly updated FREE credit score check:

• Free Credit Report Card - We'll break down your score and show you what's impacting your credit.

• Free Credit Strategy - Once you know where you stand, we'll give you a custom action plan to take control of your credit.

• Free Credit Alerts and Monitoring - Free 24/7 credit monitoring with early identity theft warnings and fraud detection

• My Borrowing Power - Get personalized recommendations for the best credit cards, mortgage rates, and refinance options.

• Free ID Theft Protection - You're always protected with $50,000 in identity theft protection insurance.

• Our Robo Credit technology helps us provide customized, tech-driven recommendations so you can make the most of your finances.

We help you answer questions such as:
-What is my credit score?  
-How can I check my credit score?
-How can I better manage my credit?


1000's+ news mentions, including:

• The Wall Street Journal

• The New York Times

• NBC’s TODAY Show

• CNN Money

• CNBC

To learn more, visit Credit Sesame.

recentChanges: We are always making improvements to Credit Sesame. To make sure you can access the latest analysis and alerts about your credit score, keep your Updates turned on!
comments: So far things are working fairly well with app. Although I find it strange that since I am using the app often,I have been receiving calls from robo-messeges stating my ssn is being "suspended " due to suspicious activity and to call a specific number. I call the number and usually receive a voice recording telling me that the mailbox is full and to try again later. If this is true at all, wouldn't it be posted in all this glorious information that you provide to me?

I highly recommend this app. It's not only free, but more importantly, a great educational tool to teach you how to use credit wisely as well as improve your own credit score. And now offering even more updated financial advice to help you wisely get through the Covid-19 pandemic. Love all the new features! Bravo Credit Sesame! 😊

One of the most reliable Apps you could find out there. Compared to other apps that provide similar services, I wished Credit Sesame could keep track of score updates on a more timely fashion. Other than that, it is reliable, and provides best tips towards a healthy credit score.

Quickly showed me my credit score, and negative mark against that I didn't know of. Quickly matched me to banks that I had the best odds of being approved for line of credit to start building my score again. It's been fast and painless. Great job!

Credit Sesame is very good it helps you put your credit back into place. I have told all my friends and I hope they start checking their credit scores that is why I gave you a 5 stars you guys are awesome.

title: Credit One Bank Mobile
description:
Conveniently manage your credit card accounts with the Credit One Bank mobile app. Schedule payments and review account activity, balances, payment history, offers and more!

FAST AND SECURE ACCOUNT ACCESS
Fast and secure sign in with Fingerprint (available on capable devices)
Use Quick View to see a snapshot of your account without signing in 

ENJOY ON-THE-GO ACCOUNT ACCESS
Schedule, edit or cancel payments
Change your payment due date
Check your balance and available credit, and view recent transactions or monthly statements
View your Free Online Experian Credit Score & Summary and see what factors contribute to your score
Manage your profile and account settings
Easily manage multiple accounts
Enroll in paperless documents and statements to keep your account information secure and ensure important communications won't get lost in the mail

OFFERS & DEALS
View the latest offers and More Cash Back Rewards on purchases at participating retailers
View exclusive credit card offers

STAY INFORMED
Choose how you get alerts including mobile notifications, email, and text 
Set up notifications for important account activity, payment reminders and special offers
Get notified when exclusive credit card offers and rewards are available  
Receive alerts if fraudulent activity is suspected on your account

recentChanges:
Credit One Bank releases regular updates to improve performance and enhance your experience. In this release, we’ve added:
* Enhanced browsing for More Rewards
* New shortcuts for Pay Bill, Quick View, Offers, and Support
* Performance enhancements & bug fixes
comments: It's easy to use. They're a little behind but definitely improving consistently. But there's a few features that I'm not 100% in love with. Like the payment stuff. Only saving one bank account to make payments. And it's slow to make them. I do like it overall, though. Definitely have experienced way worse. And anything they lack here has been made up with on the phone customer service in my experiences. Thanks, guys!

I had to uninstall this several times, I have nothing but problems with this app it used to work until my last update. I don't remember what date that was but I haven't used this app for several months now,I install it again and it's telling me my password or username is incorrect, I can use it online and everything is correct, but the app won't work. with this coronavirus scare tactic I am not able to get in touch with anyone by phone it's long wait times. 🤔🤷

Thank goodness for apps such as these that make payments easy! Credit One is the only company who took a chance on me, due to my not having any credit history except hospital bills that are illegally on my report (I'm disputing them) because they've been on there over a decade and should've been removed from my report years ago. Now, I pay each full balance of my credit card off before the minimum payment is even due just to show CO they took a chance on the right person!! Thank you Credit One!

I really like using the app more so than logging onto site via computer, laptop, etc. It makes it a lot easier for me, because I suffer from some serious PTSD, which @ times gets my anxiety ratcheted up for no logical reason 😔😔. It's also great to be able to get notifications of statements so I can schedule my payments way in advance because with FMS &PTSD, my brain no longer has some serious issues with time and not realizing how much time has passed. 👍👍 for this app AND company!! ♥️♥️

The app always gives you an error message stating that i do not have internet service even on wifi. Other apps work on my phone as well as rhe internet. Customer service was a waste of time. 2 hour phone call for nothing...the outsourced customer service reps are the worst. They are very unhelpful and rude. The only way to get anything done is to get a rep in the U.S. otherwise it will be a frustrating experiance. Save time amd frustration and get a card with another financial institution.

title: Albert: Save and Spend Smarter
description:
YOUR FRIEND IN FINANCE
Combining human guidance with cutting-edge technology, Albert automates your financial life — so you can be free to enjoy it. Build savings, meet bills, end the overspending cycle and develop your financial IQ, right from the palm of your hand.

Download now to see why Forbes, Huffington Post, The New York Times and others have recommended Albert.

INVEST FROM ANYWHERE
Take your money to the next level with Albert Investments. Even if you have zero experience, you can put your money to work with commission-free investments.

Let Albert customize an automatic, diversified portfolio for you or mix and match to build your own.

SAVING GOALS IN REACH
Whether you want to pay off debt or book a dream vacation, Albert puts your goals in reach with automatic savings. We identify dollars you won't miss throughout the week, then set them aside for what's important.

GENIUS ADVICE + HUMAN WISDOM
Meet Albert Genius: a revolutionary feature offering guidance from our team of financial experts, or "geniuses."

Our geniuses are real people, not bots, with knowledge that covers most financial areas. They work alongside the app to improve your financial health and provide personalized advice.

Questions about investment plans? Meeting your bills? Paying off credit cards? Send us a text and we'll get to work.

Some topics our geniuses cover: Budgeting • Credit cards • College savings • Insurance • Investments • Debt • Retirement • Student loans

ALWAYS WORKING FOR YOU
We work in the background to spot unfamiliar charges, find extra savings and identify bills to lower. We send smart alerts in real-time, putting an end to financial surprises so you can stay on top of your money.

PRAISE FROM THE PRESS
⁃ “The Albert app provides a personalized savings account and can look at car insurance policies and credit cards to find better deals. Banks are racing to catch up with such digital advances." — NEW YORK TIMES

⁃ "Dying for an app that takes the math out of budgeting? Albert would be the best choice for you." — FORBES

⁃ "For a clear picture of where my spending is going, access to advice and suggestions for where to improve, I’ll definitely stick with Albert." — HUFFINGTON POST

FEATURES
• A custom financial plan
• Our on-demand support team of real financial geniuses
• Albert Savings: the cutting-edge feature created to help reach your goals faster
• Albert Investments: our commission-free service that helps anyone become an investor
• Smart alerts for rising bills, bank fees and new subscription charges
• Automatic account syncing puts all your finances in one clean interface
• Thousands of supported U.S. financial institutions
• 24-7 account monitoring for fraud and fees

SECURITY
• Your peace of mind is our highest priority.
• Albert uses cutting-edge technology to protect your most sensitive information.

INSURANCE
• Funds in your Albert Savings account are FDIC-insured. Should anything happen to the member bank or company holding your savings, you'll be insured for up to $250,000 of your money in the account.

• Funds in your Albert Investments account are SIPC-protected. This is a more limited protection against the loss of securities and cash held at a member firm up to $500,000 in the event the firm fails. This does not protect the securities you own from going down in value if the market changes.

Albert Investments, LLC is a Registered Investment Advisor. Albert can only offer investment services to clients where Albert and its representatives are properly licensed. The content posted is solely to inform. Investments are risky: you could lose money, and past performance is no guarantee of future returns. Albert is only available to U.S. residents who are 18+. For more information, see our Form ADV Part II and our Terms of Use at albert.com.

• Albert uses cutting-edge technology to protect your most sensitive information.

INSURANCE
• Funds in your Albert Savings account are FDIC-insured. Should anything happen to the member bank or company holding your savings, you'll be insured for up to $250,000 of your money in the account.

• Funds in your Albert Investments account are SIPC-protected. This is a more limited protection against the loss of securities and cash held at a member firm up to $500,000 in the event the firm fails. This does not protect the securities you own from going down in value if the market changes.

Albert Investments, LLC is a Registered Investment Advisor. Albert can only offer investment services to clients where Albert and its representatives are properly licensed. The content posted is solely to inform. Investments are risky: you could lose money, and past performance is no guarantee of future returns. Albert is only available to U.S. residents who are 18+. For more information, see our Form ADV Part II and our Terms of Use at albert.com.
summary: Save. Plan. Budget.
recentChanges:
Your Genius just got a bit smarter: introducing Albert Investments!
• No matter your budget or experience, put your money to work with our commission-free guided investing service.
• Select and manage your own funds. Or, tell us about your goals and receive a Genius portfolio customized to your profile in minutes.
• And, don’t miss the interactive Genius tab. Get help with the financial topics you care about most.
• As always, enjoy our latest handful of tweaks and bug fixes.
comments: So far, so good! I've received my advanced after being asked a bunch of questions including asking your SSN just letting you know. They do ask that you put back at least $1 for what they call a rainy day fund which is withdrawn from your account attached monthly as well. I have not however used the Gold feature of the app, which actually asks that you expend more money to interact with that and I don't need that feature anyway.

Bank balance updates are a little slow but I love having all my accounts monitored in one place. I keep track of my student loans and credit cards. Also the investing portion has been working out well. It's simple, easy and great for me to get some experience playing around in the stock market.

Loving it already. Day one and I've already switched my car insurance because of the app's insurance comparing tool. I have a clear idea of what I spend on (bills/non essentials) and where I can save. I feel productive and set up for success.

Just give me the money on my prepaid debit cards until I get an actual bank debit card. I will spend as I want to spend. But this app could keep track of it all in a cute funny way. Lol good like better for me. I want to have my money already in my ears in my eyes like so to move on and a way for it to always get to me Real fast and easy.

Im so upset. I tryed this app thinking it was lime dave and it is really not! They charge you right from the start. They wont let you get to the main menu untill you pay. They take money from your real account and put it into their own account. So they can take my money and are all in my bank and i cant get out of it or cancle it in anyway. I feel like i just got scammed and now they wont answer me.. Someone please help me.

title: State Farm®
description:
With the State Farm® mobile app, you can manage your insurance and banking accounts, request roadside assistance, file and track claims, and much more. Just another way we’re here to help life go right.®

View and manage your insurance policies.
•	Quickly pay your insurance bill- even with Android Pay
•	View your auto insurance ID card
•	View your insurance policies and coverage details

comments: After my original review I was contacted by the developer who told me that this option is available on the map. I guess I missed it. Hopefully I won't need roadside assistance soon, but this is good to know. Thanks. Original review: App is getting better/easier to use but one big improvement that could be made to roadside assistance would be to allow the option of typing in an address rather than tap the destination on a map. If I break down in an unfamiliar city and need a tow to a place where I've never been, it might be difficult to locate the destination on a map.

App is almost as bad as there service. No feature works properly. Doesnt save anything correctly. The features they choose to implement wouldn't be that helpful even if they worked properly. Not to mention there service is abhorrent and actively tries to screw you out of what you paid for.
I've been trying to make a payment for 3 days and it keeps telling me theres a technical difficulty and to try again later. PLEASE FIX THIS.

Terrible app! Is never up to date when it should be the most up to date thing i can view as far as my policy. Cant pake payments until they are late and policy is about to be cut off. But i can make a full years payment on my homeowners policy...makes no sence. I should be able to make a payment at any point in time. Till then 1 star

The app developers got back with me and it looks like they fixed the app!!! First problem I was having was logging in, but that's been corrected, then the app wouldn't show my current due bill, but that looks liked it's been corrected as well!!! I'll see when the time comes and give 5-STARS!!! Great app!!! Thanks!!! : ) DW, OH

title: Payday Advance Loans: Instant Loan App
description:
Don’t let money control you! Borrow money to meet your needs and enjoy flexible payment terms with instant borrow cash app.

Take a break and live freely with our money lending app! Stop fretting about running out of cash at the hour of need as you can easily apply for instant loans and get the approved in a matter of minutes. No need to ask your friends to support you in hour of financial crises as you can easily get extra cash by applying for discrete installment loans with our loan app. 

Try Payday Advance Loans: Instant Loan App today!

Borrow money instantly

Cut the hassle of going through complicated loan application processes as you can switch to a much more streamlined system of loan approval with our app. Apply for loans and get cash in your account within a matter of minutes. We offer a highly streamlined registration and loan lending process in which you can get cash on same day of loan application.

Emergency installment loans

Got a sick relative to tend to? Met with an accident? Need to pay unexpected bills? No matter what kind of unforeseen financial situation has risen up for you, you can always get quick installment loans with just a few taps on our app. Apply with confidence and solve your issues easily. 

Borrow cash at good rates

Evade the trouble of high interest and troublesome payment terms as you can choose from a number of lending options. Choose a lender who is willing to offer you good rates at flexible payment terms to make your life easier. Pay whenever you can. It is all about you! Use our advanced search tool to find a suitable lender near you. Approve your profile and get short term loans instantly.

How to use Payday Advance Loans: Instant Loan App:

· Download and launch the app
· Find a suitable lender for lending money
· Apply for installment loans and set the terms
· Borrow cash at good rates and get online loans instantly
· Borrow money at the hour of emergency
· Choose safe and secure lending options

Features of Payday Advance Loans: Instant Loan App:

· Simple and easy UI/UX
· Fresh app layout with new features
· Get online loans with just a few taps on the screen
· Apply for short term loans and installment loans discretely and securely
· Transparent borrow cash app with no extra fees or hidden charges
· Borrow money with complete confidence and privacy
· Find suitable lending parties with advanced search filters
· 100% loan assurance with flexibility in returning terms
· Instant approvals and minimal hassle of registration process
· Safe and secure money lending in a highly moderated system
· Steer clear of frauds and scammers with our reliable app

Would you like to spend the last few days of your month without any money worries? How about getting an instant loan in tough times? No matter what kind of situation you are in, our instant loan app is here to assist you. Download and borrow money with Payday Advance Loans: Instant Loan App today!


____
Material Disclosure. The operator of this App is not a lender, loan broker or agent for any lender or loan broker. We are an advertising referral service to qualified participating lenders that may be able to provide amounts between $100 to $5,000. Minimum and maximum period for repayment - from 90 days to 3 year

APR Disclosure. Some states have laws limiting the Annual Percentage Rate (APR) that a lender can charge you. APRs range from 6.63% and vary by lender (but not more than 35% for loans from App).

A representative example of the total cost of the loan, including all applicable fees 
If you borrow $2 500 over a term of 1 year with an APR of 10% and a fee of 3%, you will pay $219,79 each month. The total amount payable - $2,637, with total interest - $137,48.

comments: I took a loan here a second time already. Everything suits me. Each new loan reduces the percentage of overpayment. This is a very nice bonus. The design is quick, the staff is adequate. Money comes almost immediately after approval. The decoration is easy without leaving your home. I recommend!

The application is convenient. I took money on my card just by sitting at home. Everything is very fast. The app is really easy to use. The money came almost immediately. I was even pleasantly surprised. I like this method more than borrowing relatives or friends. I will definitely recommend this app.

I got a loan here a second time. My second loan is already on more favorable terms since I paid the first loan on time and without complaints. This service is very convenient. Money is always at hand. For the first time, they approved a little less than I requested. But now they have drawn up the amount more!

I took a loan here online after the New Year holidays. It was just time for great discounts. Own money for everything was not enough. But I was not taken aback and decided to take a couple of hundred from this application. The service is nice and very convenient! I recommend.

I got a loan-online here last week. The conditions here are quite comfortable. But the truth was that they approved the amount only from the second time. I do not know why. I must admit, - Consideration and approval of the application are very fast. The staff is much friendlier than many others.

title: Experian - Free Credit Report & FICO® Score
description:
Get your FREE Experian Credit Report & FICO® Score* – anytime, anywhere! Checking your own report doesn’t hurt your credit, and there’s no credit card required. And now, for the first time, you can raise your FICO Score instantly with Experian Boost™. You’ll get the extra credit you deserve with the utility and cell phone bills you’re already paying.

See what's helping or hurting your FICO® Score, learn how your credit report impacts your score and interact with your credit in a completely re-imagined way. Always be in the know with credit monitoring and alerts that notify you when key changes to your Experian Credit Report & FICO Score occur.

Plus, take advantage of Experian CreditMatch™ to find better credit cards and apply with confidence thanks to matches based on your FICO® Score.

KEY FEATURES:

FREE FICO® SCORE*^
• Track your FICO Score and see which financial behaviors are helping or hurting.
• Automatically updates every 30 days upon sign-in.

FREE CREDIT REPORT
• Better understand the kind of information lenders see – like credit accounts, inquiries and public records.
• Automatically updates every 30 days upon sign-in.

EXPERIAN BOOST**
• Connect your accounts to increase your FICO® Score instantly. 
• Look better to lenders and save money by qualifying for better rates and offers.

 EXPERIAN CREDITMATCH***
• See credit card matches based on your FICO® Score.
• Compare your best options and make your choice.

CREDIT MONITORING & ALERTS
• now when your FICO® Score changes, new accounts are opened in your name or new inquiries appear on your credit report.
• Push notifications send alerts directly to your device.
 
CREDIT AT-A-GLANCE
• Easily see a breakdown of your accounts.
• Use the Credit Summary wheel to see the five key elements that make up your FICO® Score.


ABOUT EXPERIAN
Experian is the first company and credit bureau to offer online credit reporting services in the U.S. We’re now the leading provider of credit data and services with credit information on approximately 220 million U.S. consumers and more than 1.5 petabytes of data. We empower consumers to manage and improve their financial status, while helping protect against fraud and identity theft. Experian is deeply committed to educating consumers through financial literacy and funding programs, working with non-profit and public education leaders across the country.

Privacy Policy: https://usa.experian.com/login/#/publicPrivacyPolicy
Terms & Conditions: https://usa.experian.com/login/#/publicTermsAndConditionsFree

*Credit score calculated based on FICO® Score 8 model. Your lender or insurer may use a different FICO Score than FICO Score 8 or another type of credit score altogether. To learn more please visit: https://www.experian.com

**Results may vary. Some may not see improved scores or approval odds. Not all lenders use Experian credit files, and not all lenders use scores impacted by Experian Boost.

***Offers are not available in all states. To learn more please visit: https://www.creditmatch.com

comments: It's OK except that every single time you log in online it shows a page where you can sign up to become a paying member and how great a service it would be to be fully protected from scammers and such. The service they offer is minimal and it sends an email when it detects a change in your credit. The FICO score and Credit Report are free so it's not that bad. The app just takes up extra space on your phone and that page (very annoying) still shows up. They should include it in the menu.

I did what this app told me to do. It says I don't have enough credit history and i look risky to lenders. You need 5 credit card types .then it picked out what was best matched for me with my score and how i spend already etc ,etc.. I was denied on the first 2 and my score just dropped 18 points immediately. I didn't even bother trying anymore. I didnt even want too in the first place but was told this would help me out. Yeah right.

I keep having sign in problems. I have had to change my password 3 times. I changed it last night. Got in fine a minute ago, when to log back in after closing out and it's not accepting the SAME password. I have even tried all my other passwords just in case and retyped the known password 3 times. I'm getting very frustrated with this app. I didn't pay 20 bucks a month for a service I can't use.

Since last app update, cannot log in, at all. Password text box won't even accept the cursor. Update 3/17/20: you did it, again! Broke the app. Nothing on the login screen is clickable. Un/reinstalling the app does NOT fix it. 😡 Yes, I already emailed you at the address, below. Still awaiting a reply... Oh, good! Glad to hear you are working on a solution.

How long is the website/App going to keep having "technical" issues? For the past 3 weeks I have been trying to verify bills on my account to boost my credit score, but every time I do it; all I get is  "Uh oh…We had an issue connecting. The team is looking into it. Please try again later" I may have to uninstall from my phone if it continues like this

title: Highmark Credit Union
description:
Highmark Credit Union is your personal financial advocate that gives you the ability to aggregate all of your financial accounts, including accounts from other banks and credit unions, into a single view. It’s fast, secure and makes life easier by empowering you with the tools you need to manage your finances.

Here’s what else you can do with Highmark Credit Union:

Keep your transactions organized by allowing you to add tags, notes and photos of receipts and checks.
Set up alerts so you know when your balance drops below a certain amount
Make payments, whether you’re paying a company or a friend
Transfer money between your accounts
Deposit checks in a snap by taking a picture of the front and back
Reorder your debit card or turn it off if you’ve misplaced it
View and save your monthly statements
Find branches and ATMs near you

Secure your account with a 4-digit passcode and fingerprint or face reader on supported devices. 

To use the Highmark Credit Union app, you must be enrolled as a Highmark Credit Union Internet Banking user. If you currently use our Internet Banking, simply download the app, launch it, and login with the same Internet Banking credentials.

title: Flex - Avoid Late Rent Fees
description:
Flex enables you to pay rent on your own schedule throughout the month.

- Flexible rent payments

Flex analyzes your finances and recommends a rent payment schedule that suits you (like weekly or bi-weekly). You can now pay your rent over the course of the month on this new schedule, instead of on the 1st.

- No more late fees

Never pay a late rent fee again. Flex pays your rent on the 1st and guarantees you'll never get hit with a late rent fee again.

- Simple and transparent pricing

Monthly membership fee starting at $14.99. No payment processing fees, interest charges, late fees or other hidden fees of any kind.

- Safe and secure

Flex protects your information with bank level security. Your data is protected with 256-bit encryption and never stored on your devices.

comments: Great app with awesome customer service. App worked flawlessly for two months. Just had an issue that was out of their control but they took the time to fix it. You deal with real people not bots. Wish more services had their friendly and helpful support.

Misleading information sends out text saying you have until certain days and they pretty much pick which date they want you to have the money in the account & says it's going to pay your rent on app but doesn't actually pay rent, cause me more late fees waiting on them and not to mention there's no customer support with a live adviser just email making it harder to resolve issues

Edit orginal post for an update. Flex fixed the issue from a disappointing beginning. I received emails and texts of issues and their progress on fixing them. Customer support is great and has been. Managed to get my rent paid instead of waiting a whole other month. Thank you Flex for fixing this up for me.
It works like it says, and is helpful since I'm poor, but you need to make it so you can do a payment early through the app instead of having to email you directly.
This is a great app. Took a little while to get set up. But my rent was paid right on the first. No more late fees. I'm so happy. Thanks flex team.

comments: The application is providing full and detailed information about available loan offers, its conditions and already loans that have already been taken. My OME star rating is honestly A HUGE STRETCH OF MY OWN EXPERIENCE WITH YOU

The application crashed when auto-rotation was switched on my smartphone. There was only half of the screen filled with the app, the other part was white. It is better to switch it off. After the reopening, the app worked as usual. I could connect the lender and get my money easily as before.

title: Dave - Banking For Humans
description:
Advance up to $100 from your paycheck interest free. No credit check. With Dave, you can budget your upcoming expenses and be protected from bank fees for only $1/month. 

***Dave Banking is here!*** Sign up for Dave Banking and you’ll get up to a $100 advance from your next paycheck. 

***Winner of the prestigious JP Morgan 2017 Financial Solutions Lab***

Dave provides paycheck advances and budgeting assistance to anyone in need. Dave will help you avoid overdraft fees, plan for upcoming expenses and spot you up to $100 when you need cash fast.

Worried about spending too much? Dave can help you budget your personal expenses and avoid overdrafts with friendly announcements. Automatic payments for things like Netflix and insurance can make budgeting tricky, but he can help there too!

Dave can even help you find a “Side Hustle” to bring in extra money between paychecks.

Want to be philanthropic but don’t have the budget for it? Dave even helps the environment. If you tip Dave, we plant a tree for every % that you tip. 

Whether you’re hit by sudden expenses or need a little extra to make it to the next paycheck, Dave is here to help. Download Dave now and to stay ahead of overdrafts and get a payday advance when you need it.

DAVE FEATURES:

►NEVER OVERDRAFT AGAIN◄
• Instantly advance up to $100 from your next paycheck.
• No interest. No credit checks. Just pay your advance back on payday. 
• Connect directly to your bank account to borrow money fast.
• Dave saves the average American an average of $500 a year.

►BALANCE YOUR BUDGET◄
• Supercharge your checking account with budgeting tools and predictive alerts.
•:  Plan for upcoming expenses like your rent, phone bill or even places you go to often like McDonald’s. 

►ALERT◄
If you spend more than you planned for, Dave can send you alerts.
Budget and account for automatic recurring payments.

►SIDE HUSTLE◄
• Find ways to earn extra money on the side.
• Apply for side gigs like Uber or Doordash right from the app.

►GIVING BACK◄
• For every % tip you leave, Dave plants a tree in partnership with Trees for the Future.
• Thanks to Dave users, millions of trees have been planted so far.
• Planting trees provides families with food, income, empowerment, unity, leadership, education and even saves lives.
• Now you can give back by borrowing, no matter what your budget is.

►WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING◄
“This $1/mo subscription appears radically reasonable beside the cost of overdraft fees ($34).” Dave advances are 0% interest. The average overdraft has an interest rate of 17,000% and payday loans are crazy expensive at 600% interest or more.”

FORBES
“For Workers In A Pinch, Dave.com Experiments With No-Interest Paycheck Advances”

LIFEHACKER
“This App Will Loan You $75 Interest Free to Avoid Overdraft Fees. Overdraft fees are the worst. A solid solution: Dave. Not your buddy from college, the app.”

BLOOMBERG
“Bank overdraft fees are here to stay. Thankfully, there's Dave.com.”

recentChanges:
I’m partnering with companies to create side jobs you can do without leaving home, just in case you find yourself cooped up at home during these tough times. Here are two options with more on the way.

- Swagbucks
Earn gift cards for taking surveys, watching videos, shopping online and more.

- Survey Junkie
Get paid to share your opinion on cool products or services.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com/ to get some help.
comments: Great app but makes no sense. Supposed to help prevent overdrafts, but only if you're gonna overdraft within eleven days of payday, and if you overdraft before then, it considers you a 'risky investment' and won't even loan you $20 so I've been able to use it once and apparently that's all she wrote because it's only good for the end of the month. if you get paid monthly instead of bi weekly you're basically screwed. Edit: now it's only $5 instead of $20....

It's nice and all that a quick $50 or $100 shows up when you need it. Like when your gas tank is too close to low and too far from payday, or you racked up a high dinner bill, that money shows up pretty quick. It also let's you know that you are too risky or broke so restricts the amount. I appreciate that the most since other payday loans will just rob you.

During this time of unstability you can't get an advance is crazy. A rule is if your card expires in 2 or 3 months you can't get an advance which is crazy because the banks don't send out cards months in advance. So now we're stuck for the next 2 months. But good app. Has helped me last until a payday if i need it. Much easier to use then other apps like it. Much more giving to people that get money any many different ways unlike other apps being strict with their acceptance of certain incomes.

Only complaint I have is that once you automatically pay back what you owe you have to wait until the next business day before you can use it again. Definitely not a reason to not use by any means as you can have a negative balance and they will still deposit in your account. I've used other payday services like branch and moneylion, and they all let you take money out the same day you pay back. Overall I give 5 out of 5 though and am currently on the waiting list for the $100 advance.

it was nice to get the cash advance right away after signing up, but I felt a little bit like I was tricked into leaving a tip, which I didn't feel comfortable doing yet the first time around, especially because the whole reason I got the app was since money has been tight. By default 15% tip was selected, and then hitting the thank-you button submitted my choices tipping that amountand there was no obvious way to select no tip. I think what you have to do is actually just close the application

title: LG Pay
description:
A Quick, Secure Way to Pay
Leave your plastic cards at home and pay quickly and securely1 with your phone. LG Pay® is a digital wallet that lets you put your credit/debit, gift and loyalty cards into one simple-to-use app. Just swipe up on your phone to pay at the register, virtually everywhere at both NFC and magstripe payment terminals.

Gift Cards For Everyone
Make LG Pay the center of your gift card universe. The app lets you store your gift cards right on your phone, with no need to lug around all that plastic. And when you’re in the gifting mood, you can also purchase and send gift cards to friends and family. If your giftee also has LG Pay and has something else in mind, they’ll be able to switch the gift card2 you send them for one they prefer.

Get Real Money from LG
Take advantage of exclusive LG Pay offers to receive real money on your LG Pay Perks Card, which can then be used to make purchases in stores anywhere Visa is accepted. The more qualifying offers you redeem, the more money you can receive.3

Voice Activate LG Pay
For added convenience, LG Pay is available via voice commands. Simply say what you need and the Google Assistant recognizes a list of LG Pay tasks from payments to card management to customer service.

*Only compatible with select cards, participating banks, and qualifying LG devices. 
*Some features may not be available in some countries. 
*Available on our latest devices: LG G8 ThinQ, LG V50 ThinQ 5G, LG G8X ThinQ, LG V60 ThinQ 5G
Still have questions? 
Learn more: https://www.lg.com/us/lg-pay

LG Pay is a registered trademark of LG Corp.

1 Tokenization adds an extra layer of security.
2 Allowed one time per gift card. Only valid on gift cards purchased and sent via the LG Pay app, and limited to retailers supported on the LG Pay app. Switching allowed one time per gift card.
3 Requires eligible LG Pay offer. Unused LG Pay Perks funds may be subject to a monthly fee after six months. 
4 Gift cards, loyalty cards and the LG Pay Perks card can be restored, credit card data must be re-entered.

comments: Really like this app, it works perfectly when I do use it. I love the magstripe functionality along with the quad dac/headphone jack are what will keep me buying LG phones. Please add more banks though, it's been 1/2 a year and no new banks. Looking for Citi, Barclays, USAA, PayPal. It was also mentioned other LG phones would be added...V35 etc.

Wanted to try out this app and see how it works, went through the first video, tried linking my account and after I linked my account. The app just closes, saying there is unusual activity on my phone. Will keep saying that after un-installing and re-installing several times.

Beware! It charges you extra on EVERY buy! Given vending machine and a snack for $.85... Paying via gpay - one transaction for $.85. Paying via this app - two transactions first $1.25 second for $.85. Tried several times. I would call it a scam! Update : What said below on rollback transaction is true. However the problem is that I never see that rollback transaction in lgpay but only in bank client. And as I said if you pay with gpay you'll see just one transaction in the app & bank client.
Won't open without invasive permissions

Unable to enter info to setup app. Did absolutely nothing after entering name, address, etc. Cleared data and restarted phone. Now I only get a network unavailable error, despite being online with both Wi-Fi AND carrier data. Pathetic, LG...

title: Current - The Bank for Modern Life
description:
Current is the bank for modern life. We are a mobile bank and Visa debit card that gets you paid faster with no overdraft fees, no minimum balance and no hidden fees.

At Current, we believe our members should spend their hard-earned money on the things that matter most to them, and not on unnecessary fees and requirements. We deliver your paychecks up to two days faster than traditional banks when you sign up for direct deposit because while there are plenty of things in life worth waiting for, we don’t think your money should be one of them.

Signing up takes just two minutes and there is no minimum balance requirement to open or maintain an account. We’ll then ship your new card for FREE. Join the Current Community today!

CURRENT BENEFITS:

• GET paid up to 2 days faster with direct deposit
• NO overdraft fees
• NO minimum balance requirement
• NO hidden fees
• FREE cash withdrawals from 55,000 ATMs worldwide
• INSTANT gas hold refunds at the pump
• MOBILE banking w/ instant spending notifications
• SAVINGS PODS to help you automatically save money
• INSIGHTS personalized to track where and how much you spend
• DEPOSIT checks easily using your phone's camera
• INSTANT free, money transfers using Current Pay
• APPLE PAY and GOOGLE PAY supported
• TEEN bank accounts for those under 18
• BLOCK transactions from specific merchants
• SECURITY of an EMV chip on each debit card and the latest technology
• PRIVACY controls of fingerprint and facial recognition locks
• SUPPORT 24/7 (even on holidays!)

We offer a transparent pricing model with a completely free basic checking account and a premium account that costs $4.99 per month. A teen bank account has an annual subscription and costs $36 per teen per year. 

With accounts for those under 18, parents link their Current mobile app with their teen’s app and set the card’s spending limits, have full visibility into purchases and balances with real-time alerts and can instantly transfer money onto the card, all while teaching their teens how to manage their own money. 

Download the Current app today and sign up for an account in just two minutes!

comments: So, I've been an advocate for Current since I had heard good things about its features. However, when you lose access to logging in because of a phone number change?? makes you glad that you only put in $40… but I kinda need my money that I saved for a rainy day (hmm maybe 'pandemic' day)?? Now my app is trying to make me apply for a new card… Get your coder tested. I think they're sick!!

First of all the only thing I have liked about this card is my check was deposited early. The fact that I did not want the premium account and wanted to read the fine print about it, because I hit the button and signed up for the 4.99 a month. Then you deactivate the old card before I received a new one is just ludicrous to me. Next, I go to transfer my funds from the account and the system is down. Let's just say you have lost a customer. I immediately stopped my check from being deposited.

They can get better. Need to fix current to current pay sometimes doesn't work you gotta send an email and wait like 7 days for a reply. And they need to stop putting accounts under review for over 6 days while holding your money is ridiculous. Also the chat team is not very skill. You ask them a simple question and they answer like a robot. 3 out of 5 times they don't understand or don't care what you're going through.

My Current card is excellent. My direct deposit arrived in 4 days. I am also excited about how my new current Card has an option button to either continue to keep the card "active" or to turn off the "active" function, when your current Card has been lost or stolen and perhaps compromised. I highly recommend the current Card to those wanting a more saver and secure card. I give the Max rating of "All Stars" to the creator of the current app & card.

I created an account. Waited the time and received my card. Between those i got a new phone and number. Still have the same email. It's been at least two weeks that current has said my account is under review. Well, current now you're under review and it's not looking good. I'm not so sure i want an account with you anymore. The customer service is terrible. After two emails to you about this nothing has been done.

title: City Bank Business
description:
Introducing full-featured mobile banking for business. Manage your organization’s finances from virtually anywhere. It’s the latest offering from our must-have products and services for the modern business. 

FEATURES 
• View balances for your City Bank business and commercial accounts, lines of credit, loans, CDs, and more 
• Search and view transaction history 
• Transfer funds between City Bank accounts 
• View check images 
• Accept and approve payroll 
• Submit ACH payments, collections, and wire transfers 
• Gain secondary approval on wire transfers and ACH transactions 
• View and manage City Bank credit cards 
• Monitor and manage checks presented for fraud with Positive Pay feature 
• Manage users 
• Reorder checks 
• Locate the nearest City Bank branch or ATM 

SAFE AND SECURE 
City Bank provides multi-layered security using state-of-the-art encryption to give you peace of mind that your data is protected. Transactions are fast, safe, and secure. 

HOW TO GET STARTED 
Download the app and log in with your online banking username and password. 

App features only available with existing City Bank business or commercial checking account. Some features are only included for eligible customers. Required data plan not included; Android® App require data plan to access account(s) and features. Location Finder features requires enabling GPS services. Member FDIC. Equal Housing Lender. title: Bat Loan - payday advance online
description:
Online payday loans can be the right solution to your short-term financial troubles because they are easily obtained and easily repaid, and the costs associated with them are highly comparable to other forms of cash advance or credit as long as they are repaid on time. Bad credit or no credit are also welcomed to try to get connected with a lender.

Some of the financial products we have available include:

- Payday Loans or Cash Advance
- Personal Loans
- Student Debt Relief
- Installment Loans

APPLY IN 3 EASY STEPS

1. Complete the 2-minute application
2. Receive offers from various lenders
3. Have your money direct deposited into your checking account

Easy & Fast Application

Unexpected expenses are difficult to plan for and when they happen, time becomes a valuable commodity. That's why at Bat Loan, we provide you with a fast and easy online payday loans application. It only takes a matter of minutes to apply and you will have your cash advance fast!

Looking for Payday Loans Online?
When you're faced with financial difficulties, a day or even an hour can be a lot of time, especially in our fast-paced world. Sometimes you need a loan as soon as possible. While you can apply for payday loans in brick-and-mortar stores, more people are beginning to take advantage of the benefits that online lenders offer. With online lenders, the entire process is completed online, so you can expect to apply, receive a decision and get funded, if approved, all online.

How should a payday loan be used?
Taking on a short-term payday loans is a big responsibility, and should only be done in an emergency or similar situation. These loans should only be used as solutions for temporary money issues and are not designed to be used as a long-term solution. But if you feel as though a short-term payday loan is the right choice for you, and are confident in your ability to make repayments on time, consider Bat Loan.

---
Minimum and maximum period for repayment from 65 days to 2 years.

Annual Percentage Rate (APR) represents the annualized interest rate that you are charged for borrowing. It is the combination of the nominal interest rate and some additional costs such as fees involved in obtaining a loan. Our lenders offer APRs for personal loans & payday loans from 4.99% to 35.00% for users with height credit score. Since our App is not involved in the lending process, we cannot deliver any specifics about the APR you will be offered. The APR depends solely on your lender’s decision, based on various factors including your credit score, credit history, income, and some other information you supply in your request. For more information regarding the APR contact your lender.

A representative example of the total cost of the loan, including all applicable fees: If you borrow $2,500 over a term of 1 year with an APR of 10% and a fee of 3%, you will pay $219,79 each month. The total amount payable will be of $2,637, with total interest of $137,48.
---

title: PayPal Mobile Cash: Send and Request Money Fast
description:
With our improved app, you'll get the convenience you want, paired with the secure transactions you've come to trust from PayPal. Plus, there are no transaction fees when sending money to Friends and Family in the U.S. when you use your bank account or balance.

HELP KEEP YOUR FINANCIAL INFORMATION PRIVATE AND PROTECTED
You can get peace of mind you deserve with:
24/7 transaction monitoring
Secure encryption technology
Fraud protection
Fingerprint and two-factor authentication (activation required)

SEND MONEY TO FRIENDS AND FAMILY FOR FREE
It’s free to send money to Friends and Family in the U.S. using your bank account or PayPal balance. Settle up for your share of the bill, send a loved one the gift of money, or request money from a 
friend with ease.

PAY FOR GOODS AND SERVICES WITH CONFIDENCE
Sending money to someone you don't know? With PayPal, you can send it with confidence. When selecting Goods & Services, your eligible send money transactions can be protected by Purchase Protection. Terms and Limitations apply. And, if the recipient doesn't have a PayPal account, can open one easily for free.

ACCESS YOUR BALANCE INSTANTLY WITH THE PAYPAL CASH CARD
Easily transfer funds from your bank to your PayPal account and access your balance with the PayPal Cash Card. Shop in-store, online or anywhere Mastercard is accepted. Plus, withdraw your PayPal funds at ATMs worldwide.

SEND MONEY TO PAYPAL ACCOUNTS AROUND THE WORLD*
We make it easy to send money internationally. Choose from a range of currencies to help maximize the value of your dollar with our competitive fees. Sender and recipient must have a PayPal account.

recentChanges: New in this version: Improvements and bug fixes for Notifications, Send Money, and Activity. We hope you enjoy our app! Keep it updated so you've always got the latest and greatest.
comments: Having my PayPal account, and PayPal Cash card has been very convenient and easy to use. I have ran into situations where I was looking to make a purchase and the only form of payment a seller or retailer would accept is PayPal. I love the fact that PayPal insures your transaction. Also everything about using My Card and PayPal account has been smooth and easy. Thanks PayPal!!!

Almost useful apart from stupid login. Enter my password and it sends a code via text, read the text and it's logged you out of the App. Log back in and repeat the same thing again and again. Only way to successfully log in is to have texts open on my PC using Android messages. Even if I open texts on my mobile before logging into the App as soon as I switch to the texts it logs me out again.

Can never use the app, every time after logging in, and entering code for 2FA, it goes to a blank screen with a X in the upper left corner. If I click the X, I have to login again and do 2FA code again, and then back to the blank screen. If I reinstall the app, it works maybe one time before doing the blank page thing again. I can get get into the app. It's been like this for months now. Nothing seems to ever really fix this issue, and many others seeing the same issue. Please fix this!

I use PayPal for direct deposit from work, and I love it more than any bank I've ever been with. I have a card I can use anywhere in person or online, and the balance on the app is immediately updated so i always know exactly what's in my account. I'm also provided with a detailed list of what & when my expenses were. And money can be sent immediately to other paypal users. No waiting or fees. You can even create savings accounts or money pools. This is an incredible app & i adore paypal.🖤

Good App. Works great for family, shopping, and even some bill payments. My only complaint is that funds received notifications have no option to transfer to your bank. Selecting any option from the notification closes the app instead of prompting you to login to continue. This could be streamlined. Maybe leaving the app logged in would remedy that, but that would be a security risk in my opinion. Every other aspect of the app seems awesome. It's a Must have.

recentChanges: Get Your Personalized Quote for Personal Loans from $1,000 to $3,000 Start Now
comments: Thanks to the developers. It's a perfect service for the lazy ones. I took a quick loan in this app without leaving my house. Of course, I was doubtful about the loaner's honesty, so I checked it by taking a loan for the minimal sum. Money has been transferred without any problems. Now I send them serious requests. They always approve of them and send the money right away. I pay everything off on time, maybe that's why I'm pleased.

I will be eternally grateful if they add an option to get rid of all notifications and messages with different offers. They are quite irritating. But I'm pleased with the service in general, I calculate and check how much I owe this loaner or another myself. I use it regularly because it often happens that I need financial support before I receive the next payment. I would advise it you, too.

The fee isn't small. But the servicing quality, transferring speed and the app's interface compensate for it completely. I always pay my loans before the due date, and due to that, I have a good credit history. It froze a couple of times, but one call to the support team solves all the problems. Works fine overall.

This app failed me only once. I couldn't enter my account. Their server had been updating in an unfortunate moment. Not considering this, everything is cool. I can see any info on my loans and payments at any second. I have never faced such problems during payback as many people write about. Thanks to operators for doing a good job.

I had some issues. While taking my first loan, I hadn't read the conditions carefully, so I found out about the interest rate only when I started paying it back. Everything was honest from the loaner's side, but from mine, there was excess haste. I'll use this service in the future, If that will be necessary, but from now on I won't hurry and I'll ask more questions.

You asked, we listened! You can now access your TD Bank credit cards account from within the mobile banking app. View credit card statements, manage alerts and redeem your rewards all in one place—no extra apps or passwords required!
 
We’ve also fixed a few bugs.
comments: Most of the time it's just better to use the mobile website. I don't see much benefit in using this app. Biggest downfall not able to use fingerprint login which is a huge inconvenience. Check mobile deposit took forever to get working. Other issues more general with TD like not able to pay a loan from external account & accounts disappearing overnight.

Compared to other similar apps I have used for over two years, this is just excellent. The technology is designed with the seniors in mind. I never had to repeat taking pictures of my deposit instrument, unless I made an entry mistake by my self.

App easy to install and use. Depositing a check once it has been set up on the devise to be used. It's simple, sign, take pictures both sides, amount deposited, to account. A note lets you know, put deposit on check & date. You're done.

User friendly, except for the photo capture. It takes the picture automatically and is quick. Should at least give an extra second or two to adjust the position of the phone or check. Or maybe let the user have the option to use a button to take the picture.

I have a mobile access to my account and very much appreciate being able to deposit checks online. However, sometimes I want to send a deposit of more than $5000 in the same month. That means I have to drive to the bank and make that deposit in person. I live quite far from my bank, so that takes time and gas. I would very much appreciate being able to deposit more than $5000 a month when needed.

title: Wells Fargo Mobile
description:
Simplify your life and stay in control with the Wells Fargo Mobile® App. Manage your finances; make check deposits, transfer funds, and pay bills, all within the app. 

Manage Your Accounts
• Quickly access your accounts with Fingerprint Sign On¹ (smartphones only)
• View key account information without having to login with FastLook 
• Review activity and balances in your accounts
• View your credit card transactions and manage your rewards program
• Easily activate or replace credit/debit cards
• Enjoy Card-Free ATM access to your accounts at our 13,000 ATMs², coast-to-coast
• Set your language preference to English or Spanish³

Deposit Funds
• Deposit checks with ease using your Android phone’s camera
• Instantly view the processing deposit in your account

Make Transfers and Payments
• Transfer funds between your Wells Fargo accounts and to other financial institutions 
• Securely send and receive money with friends and family using a mobile number or email address with Zelle®⁴
• Pay your bills with Wells Fargo’s Bill Pay service

Track Investments
• Monitor balances, holdings, account activity, and open orders for your Wells Fargo Advisors and WellsTrade® accounts
• Get real-time quotes, charts, market data, and news

Help Stay Secure
• Visit the Security Center to report fraud and learn how to help keep your accounts safe
• Configure and receive near real time alerts
• Get notified of suspicious activity with text or email alerts
• Get easy access to your FICO® Credit Score
 
Contact Us
• Email appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com
• Locate one of our 13,000 ATMs or approximately 5300 retail banking branches near you via GPS
• Set up an appointment to meet with a Banker
_____________________________________________________________________________________
1. Only certain devices are eligible for enrollment in Fingerprint Sign On.
2. While all Wells Fargo ATMs have one-time access code technology, some ATMs are located within secure locations that may require customers to swipe their cards for entry.
3. The Wells Fargo Mobile® App may not be available in Spanish to all Wells Fargo customers. Not all products and services are available in Spanish.
4. Mobile numbers may need to be registered with Zelle before they can be used. Available to U.S. based bank account holders only. 

DEPOSIT PRODUCTS OFFERED BY WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A. MEMBER FDIC.

INVESTMENT AND INSURANCE PRODUCTS: NOT INSURED BY FDIC | NO BANK GUARANTEE | MAY LOSE VALUE.

Wells Fargo Advisors is the trade name used by 2 separate registered broker-dealers: Wells Fargo Advisors, LLC, and Wells Fargo Advisors Financial Network, LLC, Members SIPC, nonbank affiliates of Wells Fargo & Company. WellsTrade® accounts are available through Wells Fargo Advisors, LLC.

Minimum System Requirements: Android 6.0 and higher are supported.

• Transfer funds between your Wells Fargo accounts and to other financial institutions
• Securely send and receive money with friends and family using a mobile number or email address with Zelle®⁴
• Pay your bills with Wells Fargo’s Bill Pay service

Track Investments
• Monitor balances, holdings, account activity, and open orders for your Wells Fargo Advisors and WellsTrade® accounts
• Get real-time quotes, charts, market data, and news

Help Stay Secure
• Visit the Security Center to report fraud and learn how to help keep your accounts safe
• Configure and receive near real time alerts
• Get notified of suspicious activity with text or email alerts
• Get easy access to your FICO® Credit Score
 
Contact Us
• Email appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com
• Locate one of our 13,000 ATMs or approximately 5300 retail banking branches near you via GPS
• Set up an appointment to meet with a Banker

1. Only certain devices are eligible for enrollment in Fingerprint Sign On.
2. While all Wells Fargo ATMs have one-time access code technology, some ATMs are located within secure locations that may require customers to swipe their cards for entry.
3. The Wells Fargo Mobile® App may not be available in Spanish to all Wells Fargo customers. Not all products and services are available in Spanish.
4. Mobile numbers may need to be registered with Zelle before they can be used. Available to U.S. based bank account holders only.

comments: It does everything I need except it won't allow screen shots for "security policy" reasons. This prevents having proof of scheduled payments or terms of an agreement when making a payment commitment. Means I have to type confirmation numbers etc instead of taking a picture of the final screen. It's just a picture of the agreement! - NO security or account data is shown. Should be MY choice not Wells Fargo's. And no explanation is available. I'm forced to research other banks online banking now.

It's a problem when I'm in the middle of using the app and it then says that my session has expired even though I haven't left it alone for even 10 seconds. It's also annoying that when I login to the app it says "Welcome back, here's when you last logged in" and I then have to tap to get to my account. My previous bank app after login would take me straight to my account to see my balance, I sometimes just need to know my balance and don't have the time to wait for it to load an extra screen.

My experience was absolutely AAA rating. The young lady explained how to deposit my check by taking a photo of it which I've never done before & I'm a 63 year old lady and always come into the bank to deposit my check. I don't put it thru the ATM because I don't trust it, but because of coronavirus I am on quarantine & my daughter tried to deposit it thru the ATM and it wouldn't accept. Because I need my money but I did not want to go against my quarantine she helped me tremendously. Thx's 👍

This app is so frustrating trying to find information. You cant even get customer service using this app. I tried finding my routing number on my app cause i wasn't home so i had to call customer service just for that information. You guys need to make your app more user friendly and have more information so that we don't have to waste our time and your employees time with the small things like a routing number.
I love the app. I can pay my bills , check everything . The only thing is that when I want to send money to another coutry can't do it from the app. I have to log on computer. Overall very happy.

title: Mr. Cooper
description:
OWN YOUR HOME LIKE NEVER BEFORE 

The fully-rebuilt Mr. Cooper app with Home Intelligence℠ goes far beyond simply making payments. It gives you all the tools you need to make informed decisions about your Mr. Cooper mortgage. 

• Track your home value and equity 
• Discover how to unlock cash using your home equity
• Find ways to potentially lower your monthly mortgage payment
• Explore strategies for using your home equity to pay off debt

See your home more intelligently and start owning it like never before!


SEE YOUR HOME LIKE A REAL-ESTATE EXPERT

Get the intel you need to make confident decisions about your home. Use the new Home Snapshot℠ tool to track your home’s estimated value and tax history, as well as local housing market trends.

TAKE CONTROL OF HOMEOWNERSHIP’S “WHAT Ifs” 

Stop worrying about what might happen and start dreaming about what could. Our Tune-Up tool gives you an edge that might help you  

• Discover new ways to put your equity to work
• Calculate how to own your home sooner
• See if your payments could be lower
• Run bundling scenarios to get rid of higher-interest debt

NOT TO MENTION…

Of course we’ve included all the basics you need to manage your home single-handedly. Sign in with your face or fingerprint, access FICO® Score monitoring* as well as important loan documents.


COOPERS ARE STANDING BY

Want to talk to a real person? With our new app, you’ll have access to a Mr. Cooper home loan professional when you need it, where you need it.

*FICO Score available for primary borrowers only

Nationstar Mortgage LLC, d/b/a 8950 Cypress Waters Boulevard Dallas, TX 75019 
Equal Housing Opportunity, NMLS: #2119 NMLS Consumer Access (www.nmlsconsumeraccess.org)

comments: So far, so good with being able to manage my mortgage - much better than my previous servicer! However, I have a question about an item under settings called "shake to round up". I can't find any information regarding what this feature actually does. I don't want to enable it until I get the info. Thanks for you help!

Twice I've had issues with it telling me my username and/or password is incorrect. The first time, I called customer service and they had me register under a different e-mail address. Worked fine for months and now am having the same issues. Tried to pay over the phone and they want to charge me "up to $14" in order to process a payment by phone. I've now run out of e-mails to use so I hope they just fix this issue.

Thought this was going to be a good way to keep track of my mortgage.......WRONG!!!! Says my user name or password is wrong, so I tried to do the "forgot password" option and it says my user name is wrong??!?!?! It's my email address so how can that be wrong???? Very disappointed. Can't even log in to check anything. Guess I'll just delete it and keep using paper bills....😉🤪
There is currently a frozen notification regarding tax statements that appears and nothing can be done on the screen. Not able to make pymt via the app. Phone is Galaxy Note 10.
Just downloaded. Doesn't even let me log in. Keeps saying info is incorrect, not at all a convenient way for me to give you money. Uninstalling now.

title: Zelle
description:
Zelle® has partnered with leading banks and credit unions across the U.S. to bring you a fast, safe and easy way to send money to friends and family. Money moves quickly - directly from bank account to bank account. If your bank or credit union offers Zelle, you already have it in your mobile banking app or online banking – if they don’t, the Zelle app will make it easy for you to send money to enrolled Zelle users that already have access through their financial institution.

Zelle. This is how money moves®.

Using just your recipient’s email address or U.S. mobile number, you can settle up simply and safely with almost anyone you know and trust. Even better, Zelle does not charge any fees to use the service. (Mobile carrier or bank fees may apply).

GET STARTED:
1.	Download the Zelle app.
2.	Enroll using a Visa® or Mastercard® debit card linked to a U.S. checking account; or 
3.	Enroll your U.S. checking account by using your online banking username and password, if your bank supports this feature*.
4.	Choose a person to pay, or request money from, by entering their U.S. mobile number or email address.
5.	Confirm the amount and hit send. If they’re already enrolled with Zelle, they’ll typically get the money in minutes. If they aren’t, they will be notified and can follow a few simple steps to complete the payment. 

*Some banks allow customers to enroll in the Zelle app using their online or mobile banking username and password.

Zelle and the Zelle related marks and logos are property of Early Warning Services, LLC

You must have a bank account in the U.S. to use Zelle.
