recentChanges: We update the app regularly to address bugs and make performance improvements.
comments: I'm so frustrated, I can't get in to my account, it keeps giving me a message saying that something's wrong with my phone number. There's nothing wrong with it; it's the correct number & my online company who I work for will soon be using this app to transfer my money. Right now they're using clearxchange which will soon be Zelle. What to do?! I'm afraid my money will be lost once the company takes over clearxchange. Zelle please help!

I couldn't even sign up for my first ever zelle transaction. Great first impression. Didn't have my bank available, I tried adding my debit card, error popped up to call customer service, no number or link to be found. No I'm not going to spend time looking for the number, I rather write a bad review. I guess I'll never use this app. 👍🏼

Terrible app. My bank never comes up, so I enter the debit card info manually and each time it say "Uh oh, there's been an error" proceeds to delete all 2 pages of info I filled out, and the cycle continues. Plus, I know for a fact my bank uses Zelle, because from my bank's app, I can send money using Zelle. Zelle in general is fine; the app is s#!% Use Venmo. It's miles better.

Got an email notice from a friend trying to send me money. To accept, I had to enter my bank. My bank is not listed, so it defaults and tells you to open the app. Unfortunately, the transaction isn' queued up in the app, so you have to request funds from the same person. Now's there's two requests outstanding and no one is getting paid. Zelle needs to close this gap and fix this hole.

I've used this for a long time with no trouble and recently someone sent me money and it says I have to accept it. If I click on the link they have my bank in the list but an error pops up everytime. If I use the app they don't even have my bank and if I enter in my information an error pops up again. The one time I was able to get my account I didn't have any pending activity and can't accept the money.

title: Sallie Mae
description:
Sallie Mae®

Access and manage your Sallie Mae® loans and credit cards, anytime, anywhere.

With a new look and easy-to-use features, this app is the most convenient way to keep track of your loans and credit cards from your mobile devices, anytime, anywhere. It’s simple to check your balances, make payments, view previous transactions, and more. You can also view your Sallie Mae credit card balances on the home screen. Sign in securely with your existing username and password-or with your fingerprint.

Get anytime, anywhere access to your student loans from your phone with these features:

• View account summary—student loans, personal loans, and credit cards—from the home screen
• Pay the Current Amount Due and make custom payments on student and personal loans
• Receive notifications when your loan payment is due, past due, or posted
• Log in quickly with your fingerprint
• Track your credit health with a quarterly FICO® Score
• Apply for a new loan from the app with pre-filled information
• Get answers from support with in-app messages
• Provide feedback directly to Sallie Mae
• Supports dark mode in Android 10

Note: To manage your Sallie Mae savings accounts, download the Sallie Mae Banking mobile app.

Borrowers and cosigners who have an available FICO® Score and a Sallie Mae loan with a current balance greater than $0, may receive their score quarterly after the first disbursement of their loan. The FICO® Score provided to you is the FICO® Score 8 based on TransUnion data and is the same score that Sallie Mae uses, along with other information, to manage your account. FICO® Scores and associated educational content are provided solely for your own non-commercial personal review, use and benefit. This benefit may change or end in the future. FICO® is a registered trademark of the Fair Isaac Corporation in the United States and other countries.

SALLIE MAE RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY OR DISCONTINUE PRODUCTS, SERVICES, AND BENEFITS AT ANY TIME WITHOUT NOTICE. CHECK SALLIEMAE.COM FOR THE MOST UP-TO-DATE PRODUCT INFORMATION.

©2019 Sallie Mae Bank. All rights reserved. Sallie Mae, the Sallie Mae logo, and other Sallie Mae names and logos are service marks or registered service marks of Sallie Mae Bank. SLM Corporation and its subsidiaries, including Sallie Mae Bank, are not sponsored by or agencies of the United States of America.

comments: Broken App and website will not let me make an account. Says that they cannot find my records, how would you have records if im making a new account. Every single bit of my info was entered correctly and checked and tried multiple times. Saw many bad reviews about this app, guess they were true. Also sent an email, I will post how long it takes them to reply.

My credit score is going to be in jeopardy with this app and this company. The app told me that im not due for this month then next thing i know is that im past due for 4 times i think. I made 2 phone calls and tried to fix it and that i dont have to worry again. Then now the app is telling me im past due again!!!!

This app has locked me out multiple times, forced me to change my password and some how charged an account that had been dead for years instead of the one they had been charging. Late fees then occurred, and I was told I could request a phone call to discuss them and never received it. Now more fees will be added, and their customer service seems to be helping make that possible. Because college and paying loans isn't hard enough.

I always have trouble signing in. I've uninstalled and reinstalled many times because it keeps telling my username or password is incorrect but when I go on the website it works perfectly fine. Uninstalling for good now.
For a while, i avoided the app and just used the website, but the redesign and biometric login both make using the app a much better experience. I appreciate the time that went into this.

title: Summit Community Bank
description: Our updated mobile banking application allows you to check balances, transfer funds, view transactions and check messages from anywhere, anytime. It's fast, free and available to all our online banking users. Check out our new Summit Community App today and do your banking on the go. You can also locate ATMs and local branches.
descriptionHTML: Our updated mobile banking application allows you to check balances, transfer funds, view transactions and check messages from anywhere, anytime. It's fast, free and available to all our online banking users. Check out our new Summit Community App today and do your banking on the go. You can also locate ATMs and local branches.
summary: Check balances, view transactions, transfer funds all from your mobile device.
recentChanges: Enhancements and Bug Fixes
comments: The biggest drawback of this platform (SFGI) is the restriction creating passwords which entails a 15 character password limit. It is my opinion that a Federal banking institutionshould have regulations preventing them from partaking in such horrendous security practices. There is 2FA but only if you opt to leave your device as unregistered, which most people probably don't do. Device recognition is not a good form of security considering anything can be spoofed. These cons outweigh all pros.

I've reinstalled it several times and received the same error message that it unfortunately quit working. I've decided to rate it 1 star seeing how it appears to be a consistent problem among other users and still hasn't been fully resolved.

I mainly use this app to check balance and transfer between accounts, which it does fine. I have not been as successful at remote deposits -- sometimes it works, sometimes it doesnt. Easier to just drive to the bank.
I would have given 5 stars if the app camera worked correctly and I could use mobile depisit... but 6 months after I had it it wouldn't take correct or good photos of my check!!!
This app is great. I can manage all of my accounts at my finger tips. I love the deposit check feature and being able to transfer funds. Life is busy, this makes banking easy!!

title: Habitação Caixa
descriptionHTML:
Pensou em casa? Pensou na Caixa.

Com o aplicativo é possível simular novas contratações e para você que já possui financiamento habitacional:

- Verificar prestações em aberto;
- Detalhe da prestação;
- Emitir boleto para pagamento, e inibir o envio impresso;
- Fazer simulação para amortização e liquidação antecipada com recursos próprios;
- Emitir boleto para pagamento da liquidação ou amortização do contrato;
- Se já tiver utilizado seu FGTS no contrato, pode fazer as próximas solicitações pelo aplicativo! Foram disponibilizadas as opções para amortização, pagamento de parte de prestação e liquidação antecipada;
- Emitir demonstrativos;
- Alterar data de vencimento;
- Incluir ou alterar conta para débito;
- Acompanhar informações de seu imóvel em fase de construção.

Faça o download e confira.

Compatibilidade: Não é compatível com versões do Android que sejam inferiores a 4.4 ("Kit Kat"). O usuário pode verificar a versão de Android do seu celular em "Configurações" => "Sobre o telefone"

Serviço de Suporte:
- Login Caixa (cadastramento para acesso ao aplicativo e alteração de senha ou email): 3004 1104 (Capitais e regiões metropolitanas) 0800 726 0104 (demais regiões)

- Uso do aplicativo e serviços disponibilizados: email para gehsi13@caixa.gov.br
summary: Application for customers who own Caixa Housing contract
recentChanges:
Versão 3.4.0.1

A partir de agora, você poderá realizar:
- Pausa temporária do seu contrato.

Devido à pandemia do COVID-19, a CAIXA possibilita que o contrato tenha seus vencimentos suspensos pelos próximos 60 (sessenta) dias.

Aproveitamos para revisar o APP todo, pensando em melhorar sua experiência ; )
comments: Fiz update do app para pausar o financiamento e fica só mostrando "carregando". NÃO ACREDITO ser a quantidade de pessoas só mesmo tempo, pois estou desde o dia 20/03 tentando acessar a opção "pausar" no app num intervalo de 2 horas para cada tentativa, inclusive de madrugada. Eu já utilizo o app a um bom tempo e nem o acesso aos meus contratos, não consigo acessar mais, pois apresenta o mesmo problema.

Propaganda enganosa do Banco. Divulgar que dará opção de pausa no pagamento da prestação habitacional via app mas o aplicativo não funciona!. Atualizei para a versão 3.4. O app foi lançado sem testar! Clica em simulador o acesso é instantâneo. Clica em solicitar pausa não entra em nada.
Opção de pausar o contrato foi adicionada na última versão, mas ela não funciona, fica carregando para sempre! Propaganda enganosa por parte da Caixa.
App inútil, só pra fazer a gente perder tempo! Clica em pausa de contrato e não entra nunca.
Depois da atualização que contém a pausa de contrato eu não consigo mais acessar o APP. Fica processando infinitamente após a autenticação e simplesmente não avança.

title: City Bank Personal
description:
Introducing full-featured mobile banking from City Bank. Now you can manage your finances from virtually anywhere.
 
FEATURES:
View balances for your City Bank accounts, loans, CDS and more
Search and view transaction history
Control your City Bank Debit Card with the ability to turn it On/Off
Unblock foreign transactions
Increase ATM Daily Limit and/or Daily Point of Sale
Transfer funds between City Bank accounts and external accounts
Deposit checks into a City Bank account using Mobile Remote Deposit Capture
Spanish feature within language settings
View check images
View statements
Change your address
Initiate a stop payment
Update your debit card with subscription services automatically with Card Swap
View and manage City Bank credit cards
Reorder checks
Locate the nearest City Bank branch or ATM
One Touch City Bank Customer Xpereince Center assistance
 
SAFE AND SECURE
City Bank provides multi-layered security using state-of-the-art encryption to give you peace of mind that your data is protected. Transactions are fast, safe and secure.
 
HOW TO GET STARTED
Download the app and log in with your online banking username and password.
 
App features only available with existing City Bank consumer checking account. Some features are only included for eligible customers. Required data plan not included; iPhone App requires data plan to access account (s) and features. Location Finder features requires enabling GPS services. Member FDIC. Equal Housing Lender. title: Amex Business
description:
Streamline your business expense process from virtually anywhere, anytime with the complimentary American Express® Business App.

The American Express® Business App (formerly known as Spend Manager), available with all Business Cards and Corporate Cards from American Express, helps you manage and track your Card expenses and so much more. You can add receipt images, notes, categorize transactions and create expense reports that include cash expenses. You can also use the app to find places that accept the American Express Card when you travel, view the benefits dashboard and even pay a bill. For Business Cards, you can also oversee employee spending and set alerts or limits on employee Cards.

MANAGE RECEIPTS WHILE YOU’RE ON THE GO: 

1. Snap 
Take a photo of your receipt using the American Express® Business App and match it to a transaction on your Card.  

2. Attach 
You can organize your expenses by attaching receipts, adding notes and categorizing your transactions.

3. Manage
Your receipt images, notes, categorizations, and transaction details will be stored together in one place, in your American Express account. 

To learn more about the American Express® Business App, visit www.americanexpress.com/businessapp.

The American Express® Business App is available with American Express Business and Corporate Cards. Functionality may differ based on Card product or program. American Express is not responsible for the completeness or accuracy of receipts displayed. Receipts will be stored until the earliest of the following: (1) seven years from the end of the calendar year that the receipt was uploaded or (2) the date that your online account is closed. American Express reserves the right to delete or purge receipts for any reason in its sole discretion, with or without notice. The Amex® Business App is available on Google Play™. Google Play is a trademark of Google Inc.

For the full terms and conditions applicable to Employee Cards Spending Limits, go to www.americanexpress.com/spendlimits/terms

All access to and use of the American Express® Business App is subject to and governed by the American Express End User License Agreement, Terms of Service and Privacy Statement.

The American Express® Business App is available with American Express Business and Corporate Cards. Functionality may differ based on Card product or program. American Express is not responsible for the completeness or accuracy of receipts displayed. Receipts will be stored until the earliest of the following: (1) seven years from the end of the calendar year that the receipt was uploaded or (2) the date that your online account is closed. American Express reserves the right to delete or purge receipts for any reason in its sole discretion, with or without notice. The Amex® Business App is available on Google Play™. Google Play is a trademark of Google Inc.

For the full terms and conditions applicable to Employee Cards Spending Limits, go to www.americanexpress.com/spendlimits/terms

All access to and use of the American Express® Business App is subject to and governed by the American Express End User License Agreement, Terms of Service and Privacy Statement.
summary: Simplify how you manage your business expenses.
recentChanges: Minor bug fixes and improvements
comments: I can't use it since 15days ago.. It show me all the time the same message "our system is not responding. Please try again later"

This is absolutely ridiculous I'm going try and report this app to Google. It constantly hangs up. Images don't upload MOST OF THE TIME. SLOW BEYOND BELIEF. CONSTANT errors when uploading receipts. Uninstall and reinstall did not help. AVOID THIS APP
This app will lose your pictures of receipts. Want to prove you took pics of your receipts? You can't, screenshots are disabled. Idiots.

After the last update, the app does not allow me to take pics of my receipts or allow me to upload pics to match them up. Also the app split charges up so it makes it harder to match them up. It needs to be fixed.
This app constantly crashes. At least 25% of the time I try to log in the server is down. Can upload receipts to it and then the next day, poof they're gone. Terrible app.

title: Lumi Bitcoin and Crypto Wallet. Buy Bitcoin in-app
description:
Lumi Wallet for Android - your #1 crypto keeper. Store and manage Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, EOS, and ERC20.

Security is Lumi Wallet’s primary focus: private keys are kept exclusively on your device. User’s digital assets are protected with high level encryption and cryptography. All funds are held in cold storage and you always remain the sole owner of your cryptocurrency. 

Lumi Wallet is anonymous: we do not practice any identity or transaction linking and you can rest assured that we don’t track your IP and no data is stored on servers. 

Universal backup is possible due to the use of the HD wallet model - one mnemonic phrase will restore all your token wallets.

Designed to provide flawless operation, Lumi Wallet reduces power consumption and data usage.

Lumi Wallet suits all your crypto needs.

BUY BITCOIN AND CRYPTO WITH YOUR CREDIT CARD
Now you can buy bitcoins or any other crypto with a credit card in a few clicks: select the amount and add your card.     

MULTI-CURRENCY & MULTI-TOKEN
You can use one multicurrency wallet to send, receive, store, and exchange Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, EOS, and more than one thousand ERC20 tokens. And all you need to  backup them all is a mnemonic phrase. 

INTEGRATED CRYPTO EXCHANGE
Thanks to integration with Changelly, you can exchange Bitcoin and other crypto assets fast and simple.

UX-FRIENDLY
We’ve created the most user-friendly blockchain wallet. Maximum simplicity and consistency of each element is our mantra.

INTEGRATED DAPP-BROWSER
Open a dapp-browser in Lumi Wallet and you will have instant access to the hundreds of most popular dapps.

Coins and tokens supported:
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), EOS (EOS)

More than 1k ERC20 tokens:
Maker (MKR), VeChain (VEN), Bread(BRD), Cobinhood (COB), Kyber Network (KNC), Binance (BNB), Crypto.com Chain (CRO), USD Coin (USDC), BAT (BAT), OmiseGO (OMG), TrueUSD (TUSD), ChainLink Token (LINK)  etc.

comments: Finally, decent GUI for storing EOS and IQ(Everpedia) tokens. Great work guys, see a need? Offer a simple but practical solution, you've gained a supportive user here!
The option to create a new EOS Wallet is greyed out, only have the option to import, I can't import because I don't have an EOS Wallet. Why is this?

The only thing I have an issue with is the little things like design and fees (personal thing and like most we all just hate fees but understand why they are), and some crypto wallets for games are not available.

Thanks guys. Almost thought I got scammed cause the BTC took a minute to go into my account but it's all good! Even gave me a transaction ID and was able to track the status on Blockchain. Fees are outrageous but for the convenience compared to other exchanges and their verification process it's somewhat worth it. Very quick and simple; a great relief after going through red tape from even the most reputable of exchanges such as Coinbase.

How can i trust this app..there is no way to see my profile i also did not create an account i keep looking for it but i did not see anything to create account..you just have to create password for the app and boom!!you are just log in without creating account

title: UMB Mobile
description:
With UMB Mobile, you can easily manage your UMB bank accounts from anywhere, at any time. UMB Mobile lets you check balances, transfer funds, manage alerts, pay bills, and find UMB ATMs from your mobile device. 
Manage your accounts
•	Review account activity and balances
•	Access your account statement 
•	Track payments and spending 
•	Set up and receive important account and security alerts 
Transfer Money
•	Transfer money between your UMB accounts
•	Securely set up and manage transfers between UMB accounts and other bank accounts

Pay Bills
•	Schedule and manage payments to individuals and businesses
•	Manage account payees
•	View and search payment history
Deposit Checks
•	Quickly deposit checks using your device’s camera
•	Review the mobile deposit in your account1
Keep in Contact
•	Contact Us using secure messages
•	Chat with UMB customer service for account help 
•	Connect with us via phone or email 
•	Find UMB ATMs and bank locations

Stay Secure
•	Change your account user ID or password
•	Set up Apple® Touch ID or Face ID for authentication
•	Set up Android® Fingerprint authentication
•	Manage your profile and settings
Security Details
•	Advanced technology protects your personal information to prevent unauthorized access
•	No personal banking data is stored on your device
•	UMB is committed to protecting the privacy of your information

For detailed information concerning security and privacy, visit umb.com/privacy
For more information about UMB Mobile Banking, visit umb.com/mobile
Review digital banking help, services information and online agreements at umb.com/digitalbankinghelp
1 Deposits are subject to verification and may not be available for immediate withdrawal. Other restrictions may apply. Please see your deposit account agreement (called Important Information Regarding Your Deposit Accounts) for full details.
Touch ID and Face ID are registered trademarks of Apple Inc.
UMB and related trademarks are trademarks of UMB Bank, n.a. and/or UMB Financial Corporation

Contact Information
Support – https://www.umb.com/digitalbankinghelp
Privacy Policy – https://www.umb.com/privacy
Contact Us – https://www.umb.com/contact-us
Website – https://www.umb.com

recentChanges:
Our new UMB Mobile Banking App! This new version of our app has been rebuilt from the ground up. Download it today and check out the great new features.
- All new user interface
- Enhanced transaction workflows
- Shares the same user ID, password and entitlements with online banking
- New account balances and transaction detail
- Better check deposit functionality
- New secure message center
- Updated bill pay experience
- Robust transfer money features
- New full suite of alerts
- And more!
comments: That new "rework" sucks. Got to keep it real. It's slower then ever. I have had loading times up to 5 Minutes. It transferred money out of my Savings (Labeled as "Checking" on the app for some reason) and moved it to my Checking (The app labeled it as "Saving") when that is not what I wanted it to do. I wanted it to move money out of my Checking to my Savings. It it twice, and each time it did it, I had to go to the bank to fix the problem. Because I did not trust the app to do it.

I don't care for all the changes that came with the last update, I no longer get text alerts when money is spent or when money is deposited. And I get a secured emails every time I do anything with my account along with emails texts and a phone call from 1-800 number notifying me I did something with my and to get on and check it for my security.... It is just really really annoying!

Credit card Customer Reward credits don't show up in the activity, transactions, you have to download the statement to see them. Also takes too many clicks to view the transaction activity and even more clicks to get to the make payment option. I think it could be streamlined a little more. App is a big improvement from where it was.

This updated UMB app is horrible. It is difficult to navigate. There is so much unnecessary information. I got so many phone calls, text messages, and emails regarding my account. The preferences are not very clear. Improvements are needed to make it more user friendly. I'm still trying to figure it out.

This app is worst than the last one. I used to get a confirmation number on every bill pay I did online. Now nothing! I write down every online pay confirmation number on my bill for reference!Page layout was much better being able to see more payees. This was not well thought out at all!

title: Boss Revolution Money
description:
Send money and top-up securely from your mobile phone to friends and family back home anytime. Our international money transfer service is easy to use and provides you peace of mind. The BOSS Revolution Money Transfer App is trusted by millions of customers every day to stay in touch, recharge phones, and send funds to their loved ones around the world.

Send money with the app today:
+ Your first transfer free (up to $300) in the app
+ Low transfer fees
+ Transfer with competitive exchange rates (FX)

Transfer money easily:
• Send money quickly and safely to your loved ones in 45+ countries including the Dominican Republic, Guatemala, Mexico, the Philippines, Honduras, El Salvador, Ghana, Nigeria, and more
• Select from over 300,000 payout locations worldwide including banks, mobile wallets and retail stores
• Send money using your debit card or credit card

Recharge Mobile Phones:
Easily top up the prepaid mobile phones of your friends and family in more than 90 countries with more than 150 carriers.
• Popular mobile carriers to reload include: Tigo, Claro, Movistar, Digicel and more.
• See the latest international carrier promotions right in the app. 

Send money with confidence:
• Transfer knowing your FX, fees, total charge and exact amount you are sending
• Track your transaction in the app and receive SMS and email alerts
• View your transaction history at a glance
• Send repeat transactions with just one swipe
• Money-back guarantee
• 30-day rate history charts
• Compare rates with leading services

Boss Revolution money transfer products and payment services are offered and serviced by IDT Payment Services, Inc.(NMLS935577, MAFT935577), and IDT Payment Services of New York LLC, both licensed money transmitters (hereinafter jointly referred to as ""IDT Payment"").

comments: It's a very frustrating experience, I installed the app and I've been trying to register with my number and email to no avail for the past 2days. I will go back to my small world and other apps.... they're very easy. No stress. The reason I tried boss revolution money was because I use boss revolution for calls but this is annoying. I will uninstall it now.

Good company but very badly designed app. I install the app, opens the app and it asks for my phone number to send a text and i never receives the text, why? Then i can't continue from there. Why can't you use any other way? Email or phone call? Why dont you provide any means for customers to call your customer service?

Good app until you need customer service. They have a few very disrespectful reps and their compliance team does not gave synergy. I do think they can do better but they keep dropping the ball. After many months with them, I think you have other apps out there with better services. This is coming from a loyal customer that has just moved on.
Easy, convenient and fast. Exchange rates are great, sending fee is very reasonable. To me, it is the best money transfer service. I Love it.
Great app to send money the only thing is that when something is wrong it's take a lot of time to get an answer

title: Better Loans 💰 Cash Advance App
description:
Better Loans was created to help consumers access money without hassle and wasted time. We created the ultimate cash advance app for our users who need fast access to emergency money without the hassle.

We understand emergencies exist that may require access to cash. That’s why we simplified the process of finding a lender or lending partner to get the money you need. You no longer have to visit dozens of websites, fill out numerous requests or stand in line at a local store. We are not a lender or lending partner, but submitting your information through our secure online form will help us connect you with one of our participating lenders and lending partners in our network. The lenders and lending partners we work with are willing to help you get the cash you need. Each lender or lending partner in our network has made the approval process quick and easy, usually with a loan agreement that you can review and sign online.

We look forward to helping you with your personal lending needs.

How it Works

Requesting a loan is easy with Better Loans. Fill out one easy form on Better Loans and your inquiry will be submitted to our large network of lenders. Loan amounts range from $100 to $5,000 (exact amounts vary based on lender programs and your state of residence). You can have a response from one of our lenders the same day, and often within minutes. Once your loan is approved, you will be redirected to the lender's website where you can review the terms of the loan, including details about all the applicable rates and fees. If you accept these terms, the lender will deposit money directly into your bank account as quickly as the next day.

Most lenders have the following requirements to be approved:

To be accepted by most lenders in our network, you should:

♦ Be employed at your present job for at least 90 days.
♦ Be a US citizen or a permanent resident, and over the age of 18.
♦ Have an income of around $1,000 per month after tax deductions.
♦ Have a checking account in your name.
♦ Provide a working telephone number for your home and work.
♦ Provide a valid email address.

Quick Inquiry Process

Through our secure technology, we will find a lender in our network that is willing to take work with you based on the information you submit. Once we have a lender ready to work with you, that lender will contact you to get any additional information they might need (such as verification of employment, pay stubs, etc.).

Cash Sent Directly To You

After your lender has taken and approved your request, cash will be deposited directly into your bank account. That means you don’t have to take a trip to the bank to endorse and deposit a check or pay check-cashing fees.

Private And Secure

We use industry-recognized security and advanced encryption technology to protect your personal information.

Automated Repayment

If you authorize your lender to take payment via automatic withdrawals (known as "ACH transfers"), then your loan payments will be paid automatically directly from your bank account. This means each payment will be on time and you won’t have to worry about missing any payments or incurring any late fees.

We're Committed to Service, Speed & Security. Connect with a Helpful Lender with our Loan App Today!

We commit to connecting you with an approved lender. We also made the process simple. No need to visit hundreds of websites and fill out cumbersome paperwork.

Truth In Lending Act (TILA) Disclaimer:

Maximum APR Allowed: 22.23%
Maximum Repayment Term: 720 Days
Minimum Repayment Term: 60 Days
Average Loan Cost: Amount + $250

title: GET Mobile
description:
Be honest now: How much time do you spend thinking about your campus ID? Now how about this: How much time do you spend thinking about your smartphone? We're guessing it's a lot more. That's why we developed GET™, an online and mobile platform to help you get more convenience, value, and fun from campus life. You can't make it through the day without food and funds. GET Mobile makes them even easier to… well… get.

The GET Mobile app will only work if your campus already offers the GET platform from CBORD. Once you download the free app, you'll choose your campus. If your campus isn't listed, please march directly to your card office and demand GET!

Features: Account Management, Campus Card Deposits, Location Listing, Food Ordering, Photo Upload, Virtual Card, Loyalty System, Mobile Access

Note: Feature availability may vary based on the configuration of your Institution
descriptionHTML:
Be honest now: How much time do you spend thinking about your campus ID? Now how about this: How much time do you spend thinking about your smartphone? We're guessing it's a lot more. That's why we developed GET™, an online and mobile platform to help you get more convenience, value, and fun from campus life. You can't make it through the day without food and funds. GET Mobile makes them even easier to… well… get.

The GET Mobile app will only work if your campus already offers the GET platform from CBORD. Once you download the free app, you'll choose your campus. If your campus isn't listed, please march directly to your card office and demand GET!

Features: Account Management, Campus Card Deposits, Location Listing, Food Ordering, Photo Upload, Virtual Card, Loyalty System, Mobile Access

Note: Feature availability may vary based on the configuration of your Institution
summary: Use GET™ to help you get more convenience, value, and fun from campus life.
developerAddress:
The CBORD Group, Inc.
950 Danby Road, Suite 100C
Ithaca, NY 14850
recentChanges:
Many bug fixes
Many UI enhancements with plenty more to come!
(We've been listening to you all)
comments: The app was great until the update. After the update, when i open the app and type in my pin, there's no way to do anything, i can't see my balance or add money to my account. I can go to settings and change my pin, but that's about it. I can't do laundry because i can't put more money on my card. Please fix this!

It used to be really convenient, but since its updated I haven't been able to order anything. I tend to grab a meal after I'm off work, so that I dont have to spend unnecessary money, but it's not letting me. Also a bit irritating is that it took away our ability to leave notes or ask for a topping not to be included
I used to use this app almost daily to check my balance. Now it wont even open?!?! What happened?? So disappointing!
The refund policies are placeholder text. Looks like there has been no code review!
Can't actually order anything. I get "error loading chunk" every time I try to view the cart to check out

title: Greenlight
description:
Greenlight is a debit card for kids and teens that parents manage through an app. Parents can choose the exact stores where their children can spend, manage chores and allowances, set parent-paid interest rates on savings and more. Kids monitor balances, create savings goals and learn to make real world trade-off decisions. 

Since Greenlight is a prepaid debit card, kids can’t spend what they don’t have. No overdraft fees. No overspending. No surprises.

PARENTS CAN
- Manage chores
- Automate allowances 
- Instantly transfer money to kids’ cards
- Receive real-time notifications 
- Set store-level spend controls 
- Turn card on or off from the app
- Set Parent-Paid Interest rates on savings 
- Control access and budgets for ATM withdrawals
- Refer a friend to Greenlight and you both receive $10

KIDS AND TEENS CAN
- Manage their own budgets
- Direct deposit their paychecks
- Access the Greenlight app to track balances in Spend, Save and Give accounts
- Create custom saving goals
- Receive money from friends & family with Greenlight Gift

SAFETY FIRST. AND SECOND. AND THIRD.
- Greenlight comes with an EMV Chip and parent-controlled PIN
- No cash back at the register to curb unmonitored spending
- Automated blocked categories for unsafe spending
- State-of-the-art SSL encryption
- Your most sensitive information is stored by our partners, who are compliant with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard.
- FDIC insured through our partner, Community Federal Savings Bank.

recentChanges:
We made some adjustments that make the app work even better.

We’ve also made it easier for parents to manage their family’s account information. In addition to your own email and mailing address, you can now update your child’s account information straight from the Greenlight app (including their name, username, password, gender, birthday, email address and phone number)
comments: Easy to use and so convenient! My kids love the personalized cards and the fact that keeping up with their money is so easy! Greenlight Gifts is also a great way to get your kids money for birthdays and holidays without having to worry about it getting lost before it can't ever be used. We love our Greenlight cards!!!!

Horrible! You can't delete the old cards once you order a custom card, you have to call customer service and then they end up deleting the wrong card, then you're on the phone forever trying to get it all straightened out, which doesn't happen because they can't see the pictures on the cards to know which one to delete. You also have to call to update phone numbers, addresses, basically everything instead of just doing it on the app. I wish I had never gotten it.

At first I was very unhappy with the app on my android (Samsung S7) it loaded slow and ran slow. However! I registered my complaint and the next thing I know I'm talking to some of their folks and damned if they didn't trace my problem, find the cause, and release an update to the play store that fixed my problem, all withing 48 hours! Very impressed with their ability to figure it out and correct it. App runs great now and so far I'm pleased with how the whole system works. This was the first time I've ever encountered a software issue that was actually acknowledged and fixed by a company.

Overall, it's a great idea. BUT there is no indication anywhere on this app store that there are in-app purchases such as a $4.99/month membership. (The fee isn't the problem just the principle.) Unpleasant surprise. Then, as I understand it, my child needs a phone to use this. I'm not sure how I feel about all this, so I'll probably look elsewhere for a solution.

Love Greenlight. I personally love all the security mechanisms. I did have to call when trying to add another funding source but it's for my security and customer service was efficient in assisting me. We have kids living in two households so it makes it so much easier to provide for them immediately if a need pops up. They are using the saving function, and learning to budget. I also love that the children's info is on the backside of the card, so no worry about strangers getting their name

title: SiguePay
description:
Send money up to 51 Countries including:

Argentina, Bangladesh, Belarus, Bolivia, Brazil, Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Chile, China, Colombia, Costa Rica, Cote D Ivore, Czech Republic, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Estonia, Gambia, Georgia, Guatemala, Guinea , Haiti, Honduras, Hong Kong, Israel, Jamaica, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Mexico, Moldova, Morocco, Nepal, Nicaragua, Nigeria, Pakistan , Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Romania, Russia, Senegal, Sierra Leona, Sri Lanka, Tajikistan, Togo, United Arab Emirates, Uruguay, Uzbekistan, and Vietnam from your MasterCard or Visa debit card with the new and enhanced SiguePay money transfer app. It’s a fast, easy, and secure way to take care of your loved ones. Download the SiguePay app today!

SEND MONEY IN MINUTES

Sending money with SiguePay is easy. It takes seconds to create an account and it’s free. Then just login to your account, and start sending money. You can send a transaction to the same recipient next time by just clicking on the recipient’s name. No need to provide the same information over and over again. 

CONVENIENCE AT THE TIP OF YOUR FINGERS

With the new SiguePay app, there is no need for you to stand in line or wait to send money to your loved ones. Simply pull out your phone and you are set. Don’t wait!

SECURITY 
SiguePay is PCI compliant with cutting-edge fraud prevention and encryption technologies to safeguard your money and personal information for peace of mind.

LEGAL 
Transfer Fees and Exchange Rates on transactions may vary based on the amount of the transaction, the destination, and the time and date that it is sent. Other restrictions may apply. For more information, go to our website, www.sigue.com or call 1-877-754-9777.

There is no charge from Sigue for downloading the Sigue Pay app, but message and data rates may apply.

*SiguePay is a service of Sigue Corporation, a licensed money transmitter.

comments: They used to have good rate fees in this application, but now those were increased too high, like others of its kind. I will stop using it. It was good while it lasted.

I love this app! It has made sending money to El Salvador much more convenient. The only downside I have is the fee it charges you. It should either be the same fee as going to one of their designated locations or at least a little cheaper because the money takes a few days to arrive to its destination. I guess they figure they will charge you for the convenience of not leaving the house while making the other party wait a few days for their money. The app itself is great though.

Bad app, the service itself did not work. *I tried calling and there is no answer *The voicemai for support is full *You cannot delete your information once it has been entered How do I know my information has been deleted once I delete the application? Judging from the rest of the reviews, it looks like it's a hit or miss but you can never tell when it will work!
Does not let you send any money of any amout. It does not work.

Found interesting updates in the Application. Now it is so easy to send money and I see that we can send money to more than 10 countries. Try the Application if you don't want to miss a better experience in sending money :)

title: Umpqua Go-To
description:
You’re far from the nearest Umpqua store. You’re tight on time. You crave convenience! How will you reconcile these issues with all the banking you need to do? Introducing Go-To, your mobile banker and steadfast financial partner. 

Your Go-To banker is no automated bot, but an actual human being with whom you can develop trust and familiarity. This app combines personalized service with digital accessibility for a better-than-ever banking experience. Over chat or voice, your Go-To banker can help you with issues of all sizes, from replacing a debit card to starting a college fund for your kids. Even for long-term financial planning and advice, your Go-To banker’s got you.

To sign up, you’ll need to be an Umpqua customer with a mobile banking account. You can open an account online.

comments: This bank SUCKS! The customer service will help you so much you'll get your account closed on you. For no good reason. This app works, is helpful, and if we're lucky other banks that don't suck will do the same thing.
So the reason why I didn't rank it 5 stars is because recently my login or sign up button hasn't been working and I can't see what my local banker replied to my question
Trying to login keeps going back to my home screen
I dont like the app and I have a hard time even getting ahold of anyone. i cant even get into my account because it says there is no such account?
I can't ever get passed the log-in screen. I do log in, but the app takes me right back to the log-in.

title: Cash Advance - Personal Loans Online
description:
Are you looking for a cash advance? Need money fast to pay bills or for emergency fund? Apply for personal loans to get quick cash today through our simple loan application. You can use our app if you need emergency loan whenever and wherever you are, so even if you don’t need fast money today, you can download and save it for later use. Or you can take a look at our app to make sure we can fulfill what you need including when you need to finance help to apply for personal loans and money online. 

Cash Advance is designed for everyone who need money fast and doesn’t have a lot of options, whether because you live far away and need to get money online, or because you don’t have emergency fund in your bank account. No matter when or why you need it, we can provide finance help for you. You can use loan calculator to calculate loan installments and apply for money online based on how much you need it. It’s a very easy cash application and certainly come in handy if you need emergency loan and fast money for medical bills, repair bills, rent, or anything at all.  

========================================
Benefit of using Cash Advance to Apply for Easy Cash
========================================

· Download Cash Advance App – Personal Loans Online for FREE  and use it whenever you need money! Feel free to download and browse our app to see if our application is suitable for you. See various installments options, payment options, and other features of our app. 

· Calculate loan installments. You don’t need a separate loan calculator to calculate loan installments, we will inform you before you agree to take the loan. It’s a great finance help so you can plan your expenditure better and understand your options.

· Fast and simple application. Application is super fast and you can apply it anytime or anywhere, as long as you have the internet. That saves you a lot of time, energy, and transportation fee! It’s so convenient to get personal loans through Cash Advance. 

· Fast Process. We understand that people who need quick cash need it soon, preferably now. That’s why it’s called emergency loan.  Once your application is accepted, we will transfer the money to your bank account so you can make use of emergency fund as soon as possible. 

Getting fast money can be very lengthy and troublesome process. That’s why we create Cash Advance App – Personal Loans Online, to  makes it easier for anyone who needs easy cash to get it quickly. This fast process and quick approval is necessary, especially if you need the money for emergencies. 

Situations are unpredictable. No  one can be sure that they have enough savings in case of emergency. Maybe your pets get sick and you’re stuck with hefty vet bills. Maybe there are other unexpected things that occur such as your house in need of repairs, etc. Whatever  it is, make sure you have our app on hand so you can apply right away whenever you need it. 

========================================
Disclaimer
========================================

We are not a lender and we cannot predict what fees and interest rate will be applied to the loan you will be offered. APRs range in this app 4.99% - 35%. For more information regarding the APR contact your lender.

Representative Example of APR. If you borrow $2.500 over a term of 1 year with an APR of 10% and a fee of 3%, you will pay $219.79 each month. The total amount payable will be of $2.637, with total interest of $137.48.

Minimum and maximum period for repayment - from 90 days to 1 year.

comments: This app is just perfect! I have been using it for months now and I love it. No invasive ads. No trouble, disputes, discrepancies, or anything. Besides, the money comes so fast. I don't know how long this app will be available, or free to use, but it has saved me countless times and I use it very often.

I had this app for quite some time. I love it. The only thing is I have never got an update on how much I can request and I'm pretty sure that by now with on-time payments and my requests I should get an update. And my paydays sometimes are off so they try to pull too early but with the date change option, it can be avoided.

The app was working fine but after the update, I enjoyed it even more. It works faster and no problem to log in. No complaints. Also, the customer support is really on top of it, makes life less stressful when things work as intended. thanks a lot, if I need money, I will deal with you again.

This app has such cool features, so I decided to leave my feedback here. The first time I heard about this app from my colleague, she used it some time ago. Yes, I was amazed by how easily can I receive money. Instead of waiting for bank decisions, I just fulfilled the form and received my money in the day.

Nice design and interface. I needed to fix a bike but the problem was money. I had tried several apps but it wasn’t a good experience. Somehow, I found this app and it saved me! Everything is clear. Money is real; it isn’t a lie or affair. It’s super useful stuff for everyone. No complaints here!

title: KELTA
description:
Start build­ing your pas­sive in­come to­day with the most ef­fi­cient Cryp­tocur­ren­cy mo­bile tool on the mar­ket. Join our 6000+ mem­bers.

Start build­ing your pas­sive in­come to­day with the most ef­fi­cient Cryp­tocur­ren­cy mo­bile tool on the mar­ket. Kelta Com­put­ing pow­er tech­nol­o­gy will al­low you to max­i­mize your prof­itabil­i­ty. Join our 6000+ mem­bers that have al­ready put their to­kens to work for them.

The user will have full ac­cess to the man­age­ment of these op­er­a­tions via the app. There will be path­waysby which the user may con­tact KELTA per­son­nel when in need of tech­ni­cal or some oth­er kind of sup­port.

With­in the app users will be able to see the num­ber of to­kens they own
(or are rent­ing) and the amount of wattage they may oc­cu­py (1 Watt per to­ken). 

From there, the user can se­lect the cur­ren­cy to mine. Pre­lim­i­nar­i­ly, there will be five cur­ren­cies avail­able for
min­ing: Ethereum (ETH), Ethereum Clas­sic (ETC), Mon­ero (XMR), Zcash (ZEC), and Bitcoin Cash(BCH).

title: Self - Build Credit While You Save
description:
The Self credit app (formerly known as Self Lender) is a way to build credit history while you save*. Build credit with Self, even if you have a low credit score (or no credit score!)

Over 500,000 people have used Self’s Credit Builder Account to build credit and save more than $300 million. With the Self Visa® Secured Credit Card, you have even more opportunities to build credit after you get started.

How does it work? Think of it as a plan that builds credit while you save, starting at $25** per month.

1. Apply for a Credit Builder Account. Your money is safe and secure in a bank account.***
2. Pay off your Credit Builder Account in 12-24 months.** You can choose the payment term and dollar amount that best fits your budget.
3. Each on-time monthly payment builds credit history and adds to your savings*. Your monthly payments are reported to all three credit bureaus while the principal gets saved in a bank account.***
4. Unlock your savings. Once you’ve paid off your Credit Builder Account, your money unlocks and comes back to you (minus fees and interest).

BUILD CREDIT. SAVE MONEY*
With an active Credit Builder Account, your payments are reported to all three credit bureaus.
 
CREDIT SCORE MONITORING INCLUDED****
With the Self credit app, you can check your credit score at no cost. The mobile credit tracker!
 
NO HARD CREDIT PULL
Self does not do a “hard pull” credit check when you create an account. In fact, no credit score is required at all!
 
SECURE ACCOUNTS
All accounts use two-factor authentication, 256-bit encryption, and fraud detection to protect your money and private information.
 
UNLOCK THE SELF VISA® SECURED CREDIT CARD
Have an active Credit Builder Account in good standing, make at least 3 credit builder account monthly payments in full and have $100 or more in savings progress and you could unlock access to a secured credit card – no extra deposit and no hard credit check needed.
 
WHY PEOPLE LOVE SELF
“Love love love this program and this app! In eight months my credit went up a hundred and nine points Super happy and can't wait to renew once the first year is up” - customer Debbie G. Individual results may vary.
 
Featured on ABC News, USA Today, Newsweek, TechCrunch and NerdWallet
 
TERMS
When you download and use Self, you agree to the Terms of Service at: https://www.self.inc/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
You may review Self’s privacy policy at: https://www.self.inc/privacy-policy
 
*Savings are minus fees and interest. Results are not guaranteed. Improvement in your credit score is dependent on your specific situation and financial behavior. Failure to make monthly minimum payments by the payment due date each month may result in delinquent payment reporting to credit bureaus which may negatively impact your credit score. This product will not remove negative credit history from your credit report.
 
**Sample products are $25 monthly loan payment at a $520 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 24 month term and 15.92% Annual Percentage Rate; $150 monthly loan payment at a $1663 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 12 month term and 15.91% Annual Percentage Rate. Please check the pricing page in the Self mobile app or www.self.inc for current pricing.
 
***Credit Builder Account — proceeds are held in a deposit account until maturity
 
****Credit scores will only be available to customers who our third-party vendor is able to validate.

All Credit Builder Accounts are issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender, Sunrise Banks, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender or Atlantic Capital Bank, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender. Subject to ID Verification. Individual borrowers must be a U.S. Citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Valid bank account and Social Security Number are required. All loans are subject to ID verification. All loans subject to approval.

The Self Visa® Credit Card is issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender.

The Self credit app (formerly known as Self Lender) is a way to build credit history while you save*. Build credit with Self, even if you have a low credit score (or no credit score!)

Over 500,000 people have used Self’s Credit Builder Account to build credit and save more than $300 million. With the Self Visa® Secured Credit Card, you have even more opportunities to build credit after you get started.

How does it work? Think of it as a plan that builds credit while you save, starting at $25** per month.

1. Apply for a Credit Builder Account. Your money is safe and secure in a bank account.***
2. Pay off your Credit Builder Account in 12-24 months.** You can choose the payment term and dollar amount that best fits your budget.
3. Each on-time monthly payment builds credit history and adds to your savings*. Your monthly payments are reported to all three credit bureaus while the principal gets saved in a bank account.***
4. Unlock your savings. Once you’ve paid off your Credit Builder Account, your money unlocks and comes back to you (minus fees and interest).

BUILD CREDIT. SAVE MONEY*
With an active Credit Builder Account, your payments are reported to all three credit bureaus.

CREDIT SCORE MONITORING INCLUDED****
With the Self credit app, you can check your credit score at no cost. The mobile credit tracker!

NO HARD CREDIT PULL
Self does not do a “hard pull” credit check when you create an account. In fact, no credit score is required at all!

SECURE ACCOUNTS
All accounts use two-factor authentication, 256-bit encryption, and fraud detection to protect your money and private information.

UNLOCK THE SELF VISA® SECURED CREDIT CARD
Have an active Credit Builder Account in good standing, make at least 3 credit builder account monthly payments in full and have $100 or more in savings progress and you could unlock access to a secured credit card – no extra deposit and no hard credit check needed.

WHY PEOPLE LOVE SELF
“Love love love this program and this app! In eight months my credit went up a hundred and nine points Super happy and can't wait to renew once the first year is up” - customer Debbie G. Individual results may vary.

Featured on ABC News, USA Today, Newsweek, TechCrunch and NerdWallet

TERMS
When you download and use Self, you agree to the Terms of Service at: https://www.self.inc/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
You may review Self’s privacy policy at: https://www.self.inc/privacy-policy

*Savings are minus fees and interest. Results are not guaranteed. Improvement in your credit score is dependent on your specific situation and financial behavior. Failure to make monthly minimum payments by the payment due date each month may result in delinquent payment reporting to credit bureaus which may negatively impact your credit score. This product will not remove negative credit history from your credit report.

**Sample products are $25 monthly loan payment at a $520 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 24 month term and 15.92% Annual Percentage Rate; $150 monthly loan payment at a $1663 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 12 month term and 15.91% Annual Percentage Rate. Please check the pricing page in the Self mobile app or www.self.inc for current pricing.

***Credit Builder Account — proceeds are held in a deposit account until maturity

****Credit scores will only be available to customers who our third-party vendor is able to validate.

All Credit Builder Accounts are issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender, Sunrise Banks, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender or Atlantic Capital Bank, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender. Subject to ID Verification. Individual borrowers must be a U.S. Citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Valid bank account and Social Security Number are required. All loans are subject to ID verification. All loans subject to approval.

The Self Visa® Credit Card is issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender.
summary: Start building credit with Self
recentChanges:
Thank you for using Self! This app update includes:
- Improved handling for unstable internet connections
comments: Awesome app. Definitely helps that stupid loophole of " to have good credit, you have to have credit already in order to build credit". This app and many others alike help young people like me get started on building credit out of nothing. Very happy with it. The credit card though, is there anyway to increase the credit without paying off the balance just yet? The whole point is keep paying over the year or two to build said credit, but a higher credit limit would be nice.

This is the most amazing app ever for anyone who needs to build/rebuild their credit. I had filled ch. 7 bankruptcy and been discharged about a year ago now. Needless to say, my credit was looking rough. Now, after 2 months of payments, credit is up 136 points! I don't know how it works, but it works and that's all I care about. Amazing service being provided here with equal opportunities for all.

Since I was already working on my credit prior to getting the CD (Dec 19) and CC (Feb 20) thru them, I can't say for sure which did what or anything at all but my credit has gone up at the minimum 50 points already! But the app is very useful and user friendly. Has an answer for pretty much everything I had a question regarding. I have the $150 12 month loan!

My credit went up a couple points after opening account. The thing that i do not like is the daily withdrawls that come out if my account. It is only pennies daily but after a year this will add up. I am sure it is some kind of interest or fees. I will finish off the term of the loan and will most likely be done with it but anything can happen. I have only had this account for two months. So a little early to tell

Excellent service. I was skeptical as there are a lot of "fake" or misleading services that exploit people with no/low or bad credit, especially of lower incomes. If used responsibly, this WILL build your credit, and build a bit of savings that can be used to also get a secured VISA credit card that compliments the main account. It WILL hurt your credit if payments are missed, etc... but if you are trying to build/fix your credit but are on a fixed or lower income it's still manageable $25/mo.

title: Leftover - easy budgeting & money saving app
description:
Leftover is a clean and simple budget control tool. The goal of this app is to develop a good habit of bookkeeping because we believe that a good bookkeeping habit is the best way to start saving money and to control budget.

With this simple budget tool, you can define your own categories, tags, and items that you purchase frequently.  Basically, you can customize everything according to your own bookkeeping habits!

Key features:

1. Fast bookkeeping procedure: By defining your own one click add item, you can add transactions in one second!

2. Highly customizable: Customize your own categories, tags, one click items, and billing cycle according to your own bookkeeping habits.

3. Simple budget control: Set up your monthly budget and the amount you want to save (even budget for categories!). We will help you to keep track of your spending and control budget. 

4. Money management:  You can add tags to transactions. The tags will appear in your home page so that you can easily track and manipulate transactions later. You can also view transactions by their categories in the analytics page.

5. Clean and useful visualization: We provide you with pie charts and histograms to help you mange and track every penny you spent.

6. Useful tools: We have some useful tools such as checklist, currency converter, repeat transactions management.

7. Simple expense tracker: You can sort and track transactions either by date or price. Or you can search them by names or dates.

8. Export data: Export data as csv file and send it to you via email.

For more info about leftover, please visit: http://shoyuland.com/leftover/

title: Upturn Credit
description:
With Upturn Credit, resolve credit report errors anytime, anywhere. This free app helps users to solve the mystery of credit scores and dispute inaccurate items on their credit report.

Upturn Credit is on a mission to help Americans understand, improve, and protect their credit. We believe that credit and personal finances are unnecessarily complex, but our tools help you get the most out of your credit.

Features:
・Securely review individual items on your TransUnion® credit report
・Dispute credit report errors anytime, anywhere
・View your VantageScore® credit score by TransUnion®
・Calculate your debt-to-income ratio
・Proactively monitor your credit and access credit education resources
・Monitor changes in your credit report and score

title: Cash Advance & Personal Loans APPROVED on MaxLoan
description:
We're here to help every day of the week. On our new loan app, get a personal loan between $100 and $15,000.

Fast loans, incredibly secure service.

Build a brighter future with a smarter loan.

MaxLoan utilizes advanced technology and analytics to provide access to credit when our customers need it most. We offer loans for bad credit at lower interest rates than virtually all other loan providers.

MaxLoan is the easy, safe way to secure a personal loan up to $15,000 in just minutes.

Simple 3-Step Process:

5 Minute In-App Form
Our secure online form takes 5 minutes or less to complete. The process is completely online - no lineups and no waiting.

Step 2
Sign for your loan and collect your funds
Once connected, review and e-sign your loan agreement to finalize your loan. Money is deposited into your bank account as soon as the next business day.

Step 3
Repay your loan
Repayment periods for installment loans can range up to 60 months. Short term loans are typically repaid on your next pay date.


You're in Control

Money Tomorrow

All Credit Types Accepted

Stress less about your credit history and focus on improving your situation. Our lenders offer loans to customers of all credit types ranging from excellent to poor. Bad Credit Loans are our specialty.

Your Security & Privacy are important to us

We understand emergencies can happen and your financial needs can change over time or suddenly. We strive for perfection in being your one-stop-shop for your cash advance and personal loan needs. Look no further, MaxLoan has the perfect loan for you!

title: GEICO Mobile - Car Insurance
description:
Life is full of lane changes. Some expected. Some not as much. No problem, because The GEICO mobile app is here to lend a hand if you ever need a quote, policy update, tow, or you just need to change your address. Now, when life changes lanes we’ll be right there because we’re always headed in your direction.
Not to toot our own horn but we’re the #1 Insurance Mobile App. Find out why below.
 
FEATURES
 
DIGITAL ID CARDS
The days of rummaging through your wallet, past expired gym memberships and old receipts to find your insurance ID cards are over. Now they’re always easy to access right on your phone. 
 
BILL PAY 
Now you don’t have to slow your roll to pay or manage your bill. The GEICO mobile app makes paying on the go a piece of cake, or slice of pie or whatever dessert you’re into. 
 
ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE
No one likes being stranded in the middle of nowhere – or even in the middle of somewhere. The GEICO mobile app lets you tap for a tow anyplace, anytime.
 
SUBMIT AND MANAGE YOUR CLAIM
Let’s be real - claims aren’t fun. A fender bender, crash or broken windshield can all be nerve-racking. That's why GEICO Mobile makes it easy to file and manage a claim.
KATE – YOUR VIRTUAL ASSISTANT
Ever wish you had a teeny tiny person in your pocket that you could ask questions about your policy, billing or more? Us too. So just ask Kate, GEICO’s Virtual Assistant.
 
VEHICLE CARE
Vehicles need tender loving care too. That’s why we make it so easy to get your car serviced, find out about recall alerts, and even get maintenance reminders. It’s like a hug for your car.
 
GEICO EXPLORE – AUGMENTED REALITY
With GEICO Explore, you can augment your world like a futuristic robot by customizing the types of places you want to see. Find restaurants, gas stations, parks, even your own car!

NOTE: To log into your account from GEICO Mobile, your GEICO policy must:
- Be an active auto or motorcycle policy
- Not be subject to other policy restrictions

recentChanges:
GEICO Mobile just went from awesome to SUPER awesome. This release is rolling out a new look and feel that you're going to love at first tap. Check out what’s new:
+Always up to date, our new Dashboard has your most important policy tasks waiting for you
+Access ID cards, roadside help, and billing from our new Quick Actions

comments: This app makes everything Geico very easy. I suggest that if you're going to have their insurance coverage you use the app. Save-A-Lot on paperwork saves a lot of hassle for the customer service people. And if you have to use customer service it's no big deal they're some of the most amazing people on Earth anyways.

The EASIEST app for all of your insurance needs! I had to make a claim a few months ago and was able to do it completely through the app in minutes. Also I needed to postpone this weeks payment and literally had it done after 3 taps on the screen! Great job, Geico!

I've had GEICO insurance for almost 30 years. I didn't switch to USAA after joining the military and I won't switch to any other insurer when I retire soon (Yay!). The reason is, no other insurer could give me full coverage including a rental if needed plus towing if needed for the same price or less, than GEICO. With GEICO I get more coverage for less money. Other insurers offered me less coverage for more money.

This app stops responding more often than it actually returns any data when you click something. I'm often putting my phone down for it to lock before the app actually loads anything. Either it's an issue with the app or geicos api. Either way, nearly unusable.

Old version was infinitely better. In this version there's no telling if what you click on will get you stuck in an endless loading loop. What are your developers doing? Did none of this show up in QA testing??

Annual Percentage Rate (APR) represents the annualized interest rate that you are charged for borrowing. - Install it now and use it whenever you need advance loan.
- Get fresh cash for any needs quickly.
- Fresh app design and look.

Payday Loans – Borrow Money App is a very lightweight app that will protect your data and privacy. We are here for you whenever you need to borrow money for any purpose. Trust us to give the best payday advance service for you!


---
Minimum and maximum period for repayment from 65 days to 2 years.

Annual Percentage Rate (APR) represents the annualized interest rate that you are charged for borrowing. It is the combination of the nominal interest rate and some additional costs such as fees involved in obtaining a loan. Our lenders offer APRs for personal loans & payday loans from 4.99% to 35.00% for users with height credit score. Since our App is not involved in the lending process, we cannot deliver any specifics about the APR you will be offered. The APR depends solely on your lender’s decision, based on various factors including your credit score, credit history, income, and some other information you supply in your request. For more information regarding the APR contact your lender.

A representative example of the total cost of the loan, including all applicable fees: If you borrow $2,500 over a term of 1 year with an APR of 10% and a fee of 3%, you will pay $219,79 each month. The total amount payable will be of $2,637, with total interest of $137,48.
---


Please let us know if you have problems when using Payday Loans app by sending us an email info@paydayloansbear.com We will respond ASAP.
summary: Apply for money loans online & payday advance when you need money!
recentChanges: Accessible Personal Loans for Your Needs
comments: I borrowed it here online after Christmas. To avoid missing out on good discounts and sales. His own money was not enough. I wanted to spend more)) I Think-everyone knows this feeling. The app is great. Everything is fast and simple. And the funny thing is that no one asked me extra questions, as they do in banks.

I chose this app on advice from my friends – they had to deal with this stuff, so they had something to compare with. They said this was one of the best ones, while other apps demonstrate different problems. As for me, I’ve never used any of them, so I took their advice. I didn’t regret it. Both registration and getting the money didn’t take long.

I always repay the debt a bit earlier than I’m supposed to (paying less interest). Ask the operators and they will tell you everything in detail about how to save interest costs. I’ve seen some negative reviews, but I think those people never sorted out the terms. Grasp the nuances in advance!

It is not clear what the operators are guided by when they approve a particular amount. I, for example, approved the amount less than I expected, despite the fact that I do not have a bad credit history. But in general, the service is not so bad. Everything is made out pretty quickly. I can recommend the application.

Hey there. Well, this app is really easy to use, there are no pitfalls. It’s kinda transparent and you can see the repayment amount at once. First, I was worried I could be ripped off or have to pay back more than I expected, but everything was well. No disputes so far!

title: ATH Móvil
description:
ATH Móvil is an ATH® Network application that allows you to:
− Transfer money instantly to more than 1 million persons using only their phone number.
− Transfer money between your registered cards, even if they are from multiple financial institutions.
− Make payments at any time, from anywhere, in real time and securely.
− Donate to non-profit organizations.
− Get the balance of your accounts.

To use ATH Móvil you must:
− Be a client of a bank or credit union affiliated to the ATH® network that offers the ATH Móvil service.

Participating financial institutions:

- FirstBank
- Over 85 credit unions…

comments: Worst app ever. Makes me reset my password over and over and never logs me in. Called customer service, was told there was an update happening and to try again later but i keep getting the same message and cannot claim my money.

Junk, get error on pw every time, read previous reviews and others have had this issue for years! Fix your trash evertec. I mean seriously the app dont even lock account when you type ps in wrong 100 times. Trash! Trash! Trash!
The activity log is misleading when it reports the time of the transaction saying the number of days. It should say the date of the transaction.
This app won't let me login ,I reset the passwords more than 10times and yet invalid my new password after typing it right. Fix your app,asap before losing anymore customer.
As many mention, I could not make a payment, and I got two notifications: first "ath has no balance"!!!??, then "app is in maintenance, try later". BS!!!!

title: Netspend
description:
With the Netspend Prepaid Card, you’re in charge.

Features like direct deposit offer a convenient way to add money to your Card Account and get paid up to 2 days faster.(3) Use your card anywhere Visa(R) debit cards or Debit Mastercard(R) is accepted. And with the Netspend Mobile App(6) you can manage your account wherever you go. You’ll be able to do things like:

* Load checks directly to your Card Account—just by taking a few pictures.(4)
* Check your Card Account balance and transaction history.
* Send money to friends and family.
* Find no cost reload locations.(2)

With the Mobile App(6) it’s all at your fingertips.


(1)ID verification required.  We will ask for your name, address, date of birth, and your government ID number. We may also ask to see your driver’s license or other identifying information. Card use restrictions may apply.  See netspend.com or card order page for details. Residents of Vermont are ineligible to open a card account. 

(2)While this feature is available at no cost, certain other transaction fees and costs, terms and conditions are associated with the use of this Card. See the Cardholder Agreement. 

(3)Faster funding claim is based on a comparison of our policy of making funds available upon receipt of payment instruction versus the typical banking practice of posting funds at settlement. Fraud prevention restrictions may delay availability of funds with or without notice. Early availability of funds requires payor’s support of direct deposit and is subject to the timing of payor’s payment instruction.

(4)Mobile Check Load is a service provided by First Century Bank, N.A. and Ingo Money, Inc., subject to the First Century Bank and Ingo Money Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policy. Approval review usually takes 3 to 5 minutes but can take up to one hour. All checks are subject to approval for funding in Ingo Money’s sole discretion. Fees apply for approved Money in Minutes transactions funded to your card. Unapproved checks will not be funded to your card. Ingo Money reserves the right to recover losses resulting from illegal or fraudulent use of the Ingo Money Service. Your wireless carrier may charge a fee for message and data usage. Additional transaction fees, costs, terms and conditions may be associated with the funding and use of your card. See your Cardholder Agreement for details.

(5)Fees for bank transfers are determined by the transferor’s bank and may be charged to the transferor’s bank account by the service provider or originating bank. No cost for online or mobile Account-to-Account transfers between Netspend Cardholders; a $4.95 Account-to-Account Transfer Fee-CS Agent applies.

(6)Netspend does not charge for this service, but your wireless carrier may charge for messages or data.

The Netspend Visa Prepaid Card is issued by Axos Bank®, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank®, and Republic Bank & Trust Company, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. The Netspend Prepaid Mastercard is issued by Axos Bank, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank, and Republic Bank & Trust Company pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. Axos Bank, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank, and Republic Bank & Trust Company; Members FDIC. Please see back of your Card for its issuing bank. Netspend, a TSYS® Company, is a registered agent of Axos Bank, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank, and Republic Bank & Trust Company. The Netspend Visa Prepaid Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. The Netspend Prepaid Mastercard may be used everywhere Debit Mastercard is accepted. Certain products and services may be licensed under U.S. Patent Nos. 6,000,608 and 6,189,787. Use of the Card Account is subject to activation, ID verification, and funds availability. Transaction fees, terms and conditions apply to the use and reloading of the Card Account. See Cardholder Agreement for details.
Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.
