recentChanges: Fixed minor bugs and performance improvements.
comments: I have been with Netspend for 4 years. And for the most part been happy. But I gave 1 star due to my experience today. I got a bigger sized credit from a refund we got and all of a sudden I can't use my card or my account. Then we try to call it says the info we put in is wrong so we can't even talk to anyone. App and online pulls up and everything looks fine. This is a nightmare. All the money I have is in that account and I can't touch it. Thanks a lot! Hope ya'll get it fixed soon!

Its a great app. Especially if use the flash pay . money is sent from one card to another instantly no charge but only to other cards whose bank that NetSpend supports. This card has saved me numerous times when I needed money transferred immediately to me. Customer service was excellent handling an issue with monthly fees

I have to at least like this app since I use their prepaid card, but the "Mobile Check Load" is horrible. It's problem is that it's Autocapture doesn't capture at all. It complains that it's too dark to take a picture. Despite using a dark background, and trying to keep the phone still, and trying to find a light or nonshade to use to brighten the check, I usually have to manually take the picture. Why can't I manually take the picture to begin with? I could before the last update. Trying to use it today, I had to manually take the picture 13 times to get it accepted at all. Look, if I could afford Hollywood lighting to take a picture of a check, I probably wouldn't need a prepaid card, right? Ingo Money Inc. is very bad.

I have been with netspend for almost 3 years but most recently I can't sign into the mobile app no matter what I do I have had the same username and password forever!!! It's really frustrating and disappointing at times... other then this recent issue it's great!! Hope netspend fixes this ASAP!!!!

Just like other preload Visa's that can be used internationally. Except that sites will suddenly stop accepting and you gotta buy another one. They charge $1.50 a transaction unless u shell out $10 a month. They also have maintenance fees. I don't recommend unless no other choice. If u use with any frequency I'm sure your getting gouged in the long run.

title: Mi Banco Mobile
description:
For those on the go: an improved Mi Banco Mobile user experience customized for Android™ users.

Mi Banco Mobile app gives you immediate and secure access from your mobile device. To use this app you must enroll to Mi Banco Online @ www.popular.com/mibanco.
Manage Mi Banco Online accounts from your Android device. Just install the app and sign in with your username and password.
Available for all Banco Popular de Puerto Rico customers enrolled in Mi Banco Online.

ON THE GO BANKING
 • 24/7 access to your accounts and balances 
• Manage your finances
• See your account activity, including transactions from the last 18 months
• View and pay your e-Bills and bills. 
• Make transfers 
• Send and receive money to other people
• Deposit checks through the app 

FEATURES

• Balance widget! With Widgets for Android, you can see your balances in real time. Your balances will update when you press Refresh on the Android Widget.
• Retiro Móvil
• Calendar display for e-Bills and schedule payment
• Save receipts
• Locator - Find ATMs and branches nearby
• Contact us for support 
• ATH Móvil - Send money through the app

SECURITY

We protect your information - Accounts are protected by 128-bit encryption, as they are when you bank online.

comments: The Android app don't offer biometric login on Pixel 4 and the app looks outdated.
The app is good but still no support for Pixel Face Unlock.
It's giving me trouble to enter the app & to open!

If it works, its great. Text was too small on my Oneplus 7 Pro at first, but one user suggested to uninstall the app, restart the phone and installed it again. That worked! I just hope the developers would fix this for us not do have to make these kind of software tricks. Once the fix was applied, app did what its supposed to do just fine.

Good app but only works to pay & view current balance. I'll like to be able to look at past statements, be able to put my card on hold if I lost it, report if I'm traveling etc. None of this can be done in the app, you have to logg into the webpage to do that. The app is good but a little undeveloped.

title: Xoom Money Transfer
description:
We get it. You want to send money to friends and family around the world, quickly and conveniently. That’s why PayPal brings you Xoom.

Xoom is a fast and secure way to send money directly to banks and cash pick up locations abroad. You can even reload phones and pay utility bills in other countries right from your mobile device.

We give you the power to move your money amazingly fast.

Send money abroad fast
Send money from your phone directly to banks, cash pick up locations, and even cash delivery services around the world.

Send it again even faster
Want to send money to the same person again? After the first time, simply slide to resend in seconds – no need to fill in their recipient information all over again.

Reload phones in minutes
Add minutes quickly to prepaid phones of your friends and family in other countries.

Get text updates and access to help

Never worry about the status of your transactions with text updates and access to real human customer support in multiple languages.

You can update your opt-in status for push notifications through your device settings at anytime.

LEGAL
Limits and fees on transactions vary based on type of transaction including transaction history, payout location, payment instrument, and delivery method.

Thanks for using Xoom, a PayPal Service!

In this update, we’ve made it easier to review your transaction details and have included enhancements to make your send-again experience more intuitive!
comments: Terrible app. Was letting me transfer money all along until one fine day the team decided that they couldn't verify information in my account. So now I can't transfer any more. If the information could not be verified how was i transferring before? Very unreliable. Might stop working right when you need to transfer money urgently. Thankfully there are many other apps that do the same thing, with less headache.

Its was good past 6 years Im using it. It was legit and transaction will be completed right away..you only have to wait a second!!! However, now its either website are slow or you have to wait 5 days before transaction will be completed.. If its going to be like this , might as well use western union or other money remitance If I have to wait that long!

Be careful and make sure your not over paying. No longer using this app unless of an emergency. They keep about 800 pesos after charging me a 5 dollars for fee. 800 pesos is about 40 dollars at the time. So they try to fool costumers thinking it was inexpensive. But at the end of the day they are taking a 45 dollar fee. Very expensive. Other than that for me the app was very easy to use and very handy.

Very slow - a simple 100 EUR transfer from PayPal balance within SEPA took 3 working days to complete. The process feels dated, competing services provide ID verification to speed up transfers setup and often complete transactions within the same day. Fees and exchange rates do not stand out either.

Useless system. They allow you to start a transaction, deduct the funds from your account and then make demands for documents to prove that you actually have the funds in your account before they authorize your transaction. Wasted over 12 hours trying to send money but eventually had to cancel because of their illogical demands. Avoid at all cost.

title: LifeLock: Identity Theft Protection App
description:
You’re across town—away from your computer—when LifeLock sends you a fraud alert.† Someone is taking out a bank loan in your name. With a LifeLock® membership and the LifeLock app, you can take immediate action. If it’s not you getting that loan, use the app to tell us, and we go to work on your behalf. 

The LifeLock app uses our proprietary technology, putting LifeLock’s identity theft protection services at your fingertips. We scan millions of transactions every second looking for potential fraud. And if we find your information used within our network, we will send you alerts to help proactively safeguard your credit and finances.† 

LifeLock goes beyond credit monitoring to see a wide range of identity theft threats you might otherwise miss. An identity thief can commit crimes and open new cell phone accounts and take out payday loans in your name. Criminals even sell your personal information on the dark web. If we detect suspicious activity, we will alert† you.	

Download the LifeLock app and manage fraud alerts† from the palm of your hand.
Not a LifeLock member? Use the app to sign up for identity theft protection today.

More than 4.4 million LifeLock members trust us to help protect their identities, finances and credit. It’s no wonder why. There’s a new victim of identity fraud every two seconds.1 Criminals can drain accounts, buy property, and file fraudulent tax returns in your name. 

If you become a victim of an identity thief, a U.S.-Based Identity Restoration Agent dedicated to your case will work to fix the issue from start to finish. Plus, you’ll be backed by our Million Dollar Protection™ Package.†††

Depending on your membership level, you can monitor your bank, credit card, and retirement account activity—all from your LifeLock app.

LifeLock App Features
•	With the mobile app, our patented LifeLock Identity Alert® System† will send alerts directly to your mobile device.
•	You’ll be able to respond to possible fraud alerts† right away. If you tell us that any activity looks suspicious, our LifeLock Identity Protection Agents will be able to help you.
•	Use in-app calling to get in touch with LifeLock Member Services.
•	Easy access to credit information with your annual credit score, an essential part of credit protection. Ultimate Plus members see credit scores and reports from three credit bureaus and are able to track month-to-month changes to their credit information. 

The credit scores provided are VantageScore 3.0 credit scores based on data from Equifax, Experian and TransUnion, respectively. Any One-Bureau VantageScore mentioned is based on Equifax data only. Third parties use many different types of credit scores and are likely to use a different type of credit score to assess your creditworthiness.

About LifeLock

Since 2005, LifeLock has been a leading provider of proactive identity theft protection services for consumers. We leverage unique data, science and patented technology and provide identity threat detection, identity alerts†, and comprehensive restoration services. With more than 4.4 million members, we’re committed to providing our consumers some peace of mind amid the threat of identity theft.

No one can prevent all identity theft.
1 - 2017 Identity Fraud Study, Javelin Strategy & Research.
† LifeLock does not monitor all transactions at all businesses.
†††Million Dollar Protection Package benefits are provided by a Master Policy issued by United Specialty Insurance Company, Inc. (State National Insurance Company, Inc. for NY State members). The Master Policy provides coverage for Stolen Funds Reimbursement and Personal Expense Compensation, each with limits of up to $25,000 for Standard members, up to $100,000 for Advantage members and up to $1 million for Ultimate Plus members. If needed, LifeLock will provide lawyers and experts under the Service Guarantee. Please see the policy terms, conditions and exclusions at: LifeLock.com/legal

recentChanges: We fixed some bugs with this release. As always, let us know what you think through the Feedback option in the More tab.
comments: I have become extraordinarily upset with this app. The app does notify you, as it should, when the alert points are triggered on your account. However, when I try to open the alert, I am constantly told that I am on an unsecured network, and am not allowed any further access. This happens on my personal SECURED wifi, as well as my data service. I have attempted 3 other separate secured Wi-Fi's with zero success. What is the point of the app if we are not permitted to access the account?

Great app. Gives me a great sense of security that my online safety is going to be secure and safe without any threats of theft from any online websites or anything else. I have always trusted the Norton name as the best name in the business when it comes to security measures and reasons involving the World Wide Web and your most sensitive personal and credit card information and other things that matter most to the people who have a personal computer system and a personal email address.

Someone was using this app to control my account I tried to log on one day and could not log on and I know my password so I changed the password and informed life lock about it. But besides that the app is very easy to use I like the simplicity of it.

Fantastic! Never knew all the private info that can be removed from public view and credit hold options ECT. Great app and service. My public profile and who sees it is now in my control. Highly recommend!
As soon as I opened an account for a new card - WOW! LifeLock called me within 20 to 30 minutes. I used the app the verify that I was the one opening a new account. Excellant!!!

title: Varo: Save money with a mobile bank account
description:
Welcome to mobile banking that charges no monthly fees, lets you get paid up to two days early with direct deposit^, offers easy automatic savings tools, and gives you new ways to manage your money. Forget everything you know about banking. This is banking that actually helps.


LET’S DITCH THESE FEES

Your Varo Bank Account comes with a Varo Visa® Debit Card — which you can safely lock in your mobile banking app — but none of these fees:

• No Fee Overdraft up to $50 (see requirements below)
• No fees at 55,000+ Allpoint® ATMs worldwide. Get cash whenever you need it
• No foreign transaction fees
• No monthly maintenance fee
• No ACH transfer fee
• No debit card replacement fee

Plus:
• No minimum balance requirement
• Get paid up to two days early with direct deposit^
• Use Google Pay™ and Samsung Pay™ for quick and easy payments



MANAGE YOUR MONEY EASILY

Your Varo Bank Account helps you stay in control of your money.

• Instantly send money to anyone who uses Varo
• Track spending and account activity with instant alerts
• Send money to and from external accounts
• We’ll mail checks for you for free


SAVE AND EARN MORE

Automatic savings tools let you save and earn money easily. First get a Varo Bank Account, then set up your high-yield Varo Savings Account.

• Automatic savings tools let you save money without thinking
• No minimum balance requirement to earn interest
• Start earning 1.92% APY*, then earn up to 2.80% APY* if you meet these three requirements each calendar month:
• Keep a savings balance of $50,000 or less
• Make at least five Varo Visa® Debit Card purchases each calendar month, AND 
• Receive total direct deposits of $1,000 or more each calendar month


NO FEE OVERDRAFT REQUIREMENTS
 
To be eligible for No Fee Overdraft to overdraw your Varo Bank Account up to $50 on transactions on any transaction made with your Varo Visa Debit Card you must meet both of these requirements:
• Make at least five qualifying Varo Visa Debit Card purchases in each calendar month, AND
• Receive total payroll or government direct deposits of $1,000 or more in the same calendar month.

Once you qualify, enroll by turning on No Fee Overdraft in the app.
 

STAY SAFE AND SECURE

Keeping your money and data protected is at the top of our list.

• Your deposits are FDIC insured to at least $250,000 through The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC
• Your debit card is protected with Visa® Zero Liability‡
• Your data is protected with advanced 256-bit AES-level encryption, access control, secure processes, and audits


LEGAL THINGS

If you’re a current customer with a Varo loan, we strongly recommend you do not switch to the Android app right now. We’ll start offering lending services for Android next year!

^Early access to direct deposit funds depends on timing of payer’s submission of deposits. We generally post such deposits on the day they are received which may be up to 2 days earlier than the payer’s scheduled payment date.
 
*Varo Annual Percentage Yields (APYs) are accurate as of January 22, 2020. These rates are variable and may change. No minimum balance required to open account. Balance in Savings must be at least $0.01 to earn interest.
 
‡You must notify your financial institution immediately of any unauthorized use. For specific restrictions, limitations and other details, please consult your issuer.
 
Bank Account Services provided by The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. The Varo Visa Debit Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc and may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.
 
Google Pay is a trademark of Google LLC. Samsung Pay is a trademark or registered trademarks of Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd. Samsung Pay is available on select Samsung devices.

recentChanges: Courageously conquering bugs and enhancing the app so we can make banking even easier for you. Keep sending your feedback and questions to help@varomoney.com!
comments: Pretty Good for online Banking. My only issue with Varo is the fact that if you lose your card, your only option is to wait until you get a new one in the the mail which can take up to 14 business day, before you can access your money. Over the counter Cash withdrawal are available at 3rd party vendors/ Banks, but you must have or card.. Which brings me to the point above. Varo savings do offer pretty high yielding APR's on its customers.. Which is cool, , LOANS, loans I say is what I want.

To me this app is very convenient because I never have to go to a bank, I didn't need any money to open the account, It was very simple to set up and it has already helped me get a credit card. My freinds find this hard to believe but its true. I plan on using this app alot.

Best bank I've ever used. Period. I was reluctant to get this because I'd been getting F'd in the A by ridiculous fees from Wells Fargo for years, and didnt want that again. My employers convinced me to go with a bank for efficiency. So I gave this a shot. Not only is it by far the simplest easiest to use bank ive ever encountered, it doesnt buttrape you with fees EVER, and it gets the job done. This app is a breath of fresh air for anyone who's struggled with predatory banks in the past like me
No fees so far, very easy to navigate and transfer money to other accounts!

This is a great way to get paid earlier and as of right now I have not had any issues. I like the fact you can save your change with the round up feature of the debit card. This is one of the easiest to use banking apps I have seen if you a tired of bug banks keeping your money for 2 days on your paycheck deposit to make money from the interest then you need to switch I did and I love it.

title: WorldRemit Money Transfer App: Send Money Abroad
description:
Send money internationally with WorldRemit. With low fees and upfront exchange rates, transfer money to friends and family overseas in over 150 countries using our money transfer app.

To get started, you can now use the code 3FREE and save the fees in your first three money transfers abroad.

Download the app now and save money and time in your international money transfer to more than 150 countries. It’s quick, simple and secure to use and in most cases your funds will be with family and friends in a matter of minutes. 

Using our money transfer app, you can also send money in a choice of ways including bank deposit, cash pickup, mobile money and airtime top-up.

Our app also comes with some very useful features. For example, it enables you to track your transactions, so you’ll always know the exact status of your transfer.  

Send money fast all over the world
•	Using our app you can send money from 50 countries to recipients in 150 countries worldwide.
•	These countries include the Philippines 🇵🇭, Kenya 🇰🇪, Nigeria 🇳🇬, Zimbabwe 🇿🇼and India 
•	Some of our major international partners include M-Pesa, EcoCash, MTN, Metrobank and many more

A convenient and extensive service
•	Extensive network and coverage: no matter how remote your recipients are, we probably have a convenient way for them to quickly get access to the money you’ve sent
•	Depending on the destination you're sending to, you can choose whether your recipient gets the money via bank transfer, collects it in cash or receives it in their mobile money account 
•	Identify and track where your money is at all times 
•	Save your recipients to your contact list so you needn’t fill in their details every time 

Instant money transfers
We offer you one of the fastest ways to get your money in the hands of the person you are sending it to.
•	Over 85% of mobile money transfers are paid within 10 minutes or less 🚀
•	70% transfers sent via cash pickups are instant
•	Over 50% of bank deposits are paid within 10 minutes
•	All airtime top-ups are instant.

Low cost transfers
•	We offer guaranteed exchange rates and you can choose to get daily notifications updates
•	Our low-cost fees are clearly displayed upfront
•	Use the code 3FREE 🆓 to save all the fees on your first money transfers . This is just the start - every now and then we’ll run other money-saving promotions. Watch this space…. 

Send money with confidence
•	More than 4 million customers trust us to send and receive money internationally
•	Approved by the FCA and licensed by government regulators around the world
•	125,000+ 5⭐reviews from happy customers
•	When your transfer is complete, you and the recipient receive an SMS or email alert
•	Industry-leading technology protecting your money at all times 🔒 

Need to transfer? Here’s how it works:
1.	Choose the country that you want to send to
2.	Confirm the transfer service - bank deposit, cash pickup, mobile money or an airtime top-up
3.	Select how much you want to send
4.	Add your recipient’s details
5.	Choose your payment method

Download now for free and start sending money quickly and securely.

For more information, please visit: www.worldremit.com

Want to get in touch with us? Whether you have a question to ask, or a problem to solve, our Customer Service team is available 24/7, 365 days a year to assist you at  www.worldremit.com/en/contact-us

Find out more about how to use the 3FREE promotional code visiting www.worldremit.com/3FREE

recentChanges: We’re regularly trying to make improvements to the app with each release. This time we’ve fixed some annoying bugs and improved the performance of the app.
comments: Tried setting up an account. Gave them all my information and waited over a month for my transfer to be completed. In the end had to cancel my transfer because it looked like nothing would happen. Switched over to TransferWise. I got verified and already did my first transfer without any problems.

I have been using this since last year and it was all good but it has been horrible now. My fiancee transferred money wallet to wallet,but after I withdrew on my wallet, it only says waiting authorization(even after 24hours).Went to the place for cash pickup but I was told,there was nothing in their system.After talking to W.R. support for more than 5times they all said they're having tech. difficulty and cant process OUR money! 2 days later, still having trouble??WHERE IS OUR MONEY??

I made my first transaction about two weeks ago and have since made a couple more. For being able to send money internationally, I've not used a better app than this. I'm able to direct deposit or mobile cash or pickup. What I like most of all is the ability to track and that I'm also notified when the money is picked-up. My first transaction had a problem but they worked with me through it all. We corrected the error and completed the transaction. AWESOME SAUCE!!! Keep it up!!!

Needs improvement. I had a problem with trying to pick up a transaction, made 4 trips to the place, emailed and called tech support a few times, and spoke with the local partner and could not get a resolution. Ended up cancelling the transaction and I didn't get a reply to my inquiry on the website. Probably won't use their service again if they don't reach out. Wasted my time and $$$

I tried sending a simple mobile transfer from UK to GCash ewallet in Philippines. Offer described largely in many company online pages as something awesome. Online I did not even find the mobile sending option; I opened account in app: here not even Philippines or UK were in the country list! The help support was not available in chat; by email they sent me instructions just to resend the same inquiry - "ask the sender", when the enquiry email was from me, sender. I've time to fix scams. Follow.

title: DINN: Invierte fácil.
description:
DINN es un servicio de inversión 100% digital que te permite llevar el seguimiento de tus ganancias de la manera más sencilla, segura y transparente. 

Sin comisiones, sin mínimo de apertura, sin plazos forzosos y, lo mejor de todo, ¡sin esfuerzo!

No necesitas tener conocimiento previo, al depositar tu dinero se invierte de manera automática en un fondo de inversión de Banco Actinver que se caracteriza por su bajo riesgo y rendimientos constantes.

Descarga la app y abre tu cuenta en 3 minutos desde tu teléfono, solo necesitas INE o pasaporte vigente. 

Realiza depósitos y retiros cuando quieras a través de transferencias SPEI.

recentChanges:
• Mejoras para un registro más eficiente.
• Información más clara sobre tus retiros.
• Cambios de la interfaz para una mejor usabilidad.
comments: Muy bien ya arreglaron lo de la cuenta siempre al pendiente y ahora a esperar que si se resulte pero por ahora todo bien :)
Es una aplicación de investigación fácil. Claro que hay que ser paciente. La inversión nunca es inmediata pero eventualmente todo regresa. Muy recomendable.
Recomendaría que la aplicación pudiera sacar dinero de la cuenta de débito de manera programada y así no tener que transferir manualmente
Cómo funciona la app? Inviertes dinero en acciones o es a plazo fijo? No está regulada, cómo funciona?
Excelente manera de invertir super fácil ! Dude por algunos comentarios pero al utilizarla está genial !

title: ID & Card Mobile Wallet
description:
You can now save and store all your important IDs and bank cards on your mobile. This app works completely offline and does not require internet. So you can access all your saved cards and Ids anywhere anytime without internet. 

App features : 
- Save multiple or single photo of your selected card
- card preview
- add custom card category 
- secure card with pin protection
- share cards easily with your friend or relative
- get data from scanning QR code and barcode and save it easily

Supportive cards category:
Driving license
Bank cards
passports
Business cards
certificates
id cards
Tax cards
Medical cards
Shopping cards


Declaration: 
- All the documents or cards that saved by you in this app are stored locally on your device and we do not view, save or take any information with us.

title: Engage
description:
Delinquent debts can be a significant barrier to credit.

Engage takes the stress out of dealing with these debts:
* Negotiate with collectors to find settlements or payment plans that work for you.
* Stop calls from collectors, dispute your debt, or ask for more info.
* Get your questions answered by our Debt Concierge.

title: U.S. Bank ReliaCard
description:
**Android version 6.0 and above are supported**

Exclusively for use with your U.S. Bank ReliaCard. 

TO LOG IN – Your account credentials (User ID and Password) are interchangeable between the cardholder website and the mobile app.  Log in using the User ID and Password you created on www.usbankreliacard.com OR create your credentials by Selecting “Setup Online Access/Activate New Card" from the bottom of the login screen. 

The U.S. Bank ReliaCard mobile app makes it easy for you to manage your money on the go. It’s safe, secure and best of all, it’s free. Download the app today and check out these great features: 
• Check Your Balance – Get up-to-the-minute balance and transaction detail
• View Transactions – Description, date, and total dollar amount of transaction
• Enroll and manage Text Alerts
• ATM Locator – Find the nearest ATM based on location or zip code
• Single Login – Access your card account on your phone using the same password you setup online

Your mobile carrier may charge access fees depending upon your individual plan.   Check with your carrier for specific fees and charges.  Some mobile features may require additional online setup.  Any fees for optional transactions will be identified during registration for these services and during their use.

U.S. Bank is committed to protecting your privacy and security. We collect and use information about you as described in our privacy policies. Read more at www.usbank.com/privacy.

Any fees for optional transactions will be identified during registration for these services and during their use.

comments: I'm on Galaxy S8 with latest software & haven't been able to use app or login to the website for a very long time. Can only get my balance via text. I need to see when deposits are made. What's going on? I entered my password and then a error message popped up that says "The information you entered appears to be incorrect. Please try again or contact the number on the back of your card for assistance." Seriously? I entered the RIGHT password and now it's not working? Is there any way for a deaf person be able to contact the number for assistance? Hmm. I suspect this app is not working properly. Please fix as soon as POSSIBLE!!

The app used to work but stopped with the most recent update. It consistently tells me to check my network connection. My network connection is absolutely perfect. Also, I have never had a card that charged me so damn much for every single transaction ever made it seems. Best to just transfer the funds to a regular account immediately if you actually want to use the child support to support the child instead of US Bank.

comments: Great banking experience, No overdrafts. I get paid 2 days earlier than my coworkers. Their an FDIC bank. Easy online site to navigate. The downside is their isn't a way to get a new card without calling. And they have a $9.95 monthly fee. Which I can live with, since their is no overdrafts. All my coworkers are changing their direct deposit now too.

The app claims to have 24/7 live chat support. I've tried to connect to live support many times at all different hours only to get the "not available at this time" message every single time. I used auto fill to sign up, they effed up my address. The app won't let me correct it. Green dot claims you can do a mobile check deposit, but the app won't let me. Perhaps if I could connect to live chat these issues could be resolved. Oh well. Totally worthless app.

I keep getting an error after I log in & do the verification code that's says, “You need to login to your account to check balance!” Which is extremely frustrating because I can't use my card online because of this. I would not recommend this card to anyone. The fees are ridiculous & they lie. To check my balance at an atm, I have to pay 50 cents, which is bullsh*t, it didn't say anything about that!!!

Great, reliable, intuitive. I love the option to make deposits with no transaction fee, simply using a bar code at select locations. Evidently this so cutting-edge that some cashiers don't know how to do it yet, and a manager had to come figure it out. Walmart is the only company I know of that can deposit not only cash, but also from another debit card. You can keep your account locked in your device, but set the app to key you guess your balance without signing in, for quick access.

Bloody awful. You cannot talk to a live person, so don't expect any customer support. Further, the chat feature on the app never works. I bought a card two weeks ago, and I can't even load it. This company is dealing with UOUR money, and they have zero customer support. It is surreal. They never fail to take their monthly fees though.

I'm trying to log into my account just to check the amount I have, it just keeps saying "An unknown error has occured", or "Authentication error has occured"! I called the bank and told them my situation, and the lady said it's my phone. So, I have a Samsung Note 8 and she said that this type of phone always gives them a hard time for the program or whatever just wouldn't accept the installation. With this device, they obviously can't help... This is starting to get irritating...

I had this app on my old phone and I love it. it worked really well with no problems. I havent been able to use this app with my new Samsung J3 Pro. the app won't even open. I've installed and uninstalled several times with no luck ! I hope BOG fix this problem soon.

comments: 06/12/19, the app worked fine on my note 8 until about 8 months ago. now can't even get past log in. keeps giving error message. why can't they fix the app? As of 03/09/20, I still haven't been able to log in to my acct with the app and I've updated my phone to note 10+. I still give less than 1 star. You can't rate what you can't use.

Loved it at 1st. For the past 3 mths it causes my phone to shut down and freezes my phone. If its not fixed soon I will be moving my account to another bank. I need to see my account on a daily baises and this bug makes it near impossiable. 3 days ago my account was hacked and not caught by the fraud team.

This app was great till the very beginning of January. It wont let me log in anymore and just keeps giving a technical error. I have called tech support and all they were able to tell me to do is delete the app and reinstall it. I did that and it still has the same issue.
Same problems as others. Worked fine until recently. Getting error screen and have to uninstall then reinstall to do anything. Please fix! Also, fingerprint sign in would be great!

Please ENABLE PASTE FUNCTION in the app so that I can copy my password from my secure KeePass app into this banking app. I will not use it until then. I can copy paste using the website so make it possible in the app please. In my opinion, this actually can lead to a less secure app encouraging people to make a more simple password they can remember just so they can use the app. My password is so complicated there is no way I would ever remember it nor would I want to type it out.

title: Kuraimi Jawal Application
description:
In the context of Al Kuraimi Bank’s vision aiming at all banking and financial services be accessible to every citizen and resident, it has developed Kuraimi Jawal Application, which facilitates and makes it easier for you to manage your bank account, so much so Al Kuraimi Bank will be right beside you.
 
The Application is a modern means of accessing your Al Kuraimi Bank account through your mobile phone to implement banking and financial transactions with ease and comfort thus saving you time and effort.
 
Your use of the Application will enable you to carry out the following:
 
1-    Sending Kuraimi express transfers either to customers who have Momiaz numbers at the Bank or by means of keying  beneficiary’s name and his/her mobile number.
2-    Transfer between your accounts or to any customer having an account at Al Kuraimi Bank.
3-    Settling mobile phone bills owing to all communications companies in Yemen, regardless whether the payment method is pospaid or prepaid.
4-    Paying electricity bills in all Yemeni areas and water bills in most Governorates.
5-    Knowing your account balance at any time at any place.
6-    In addition to several other services.
 
In order to acquire all banking and financial solutions by using Kuraimi Jawal Application, which works currently by means of Android System, all you have to do is open a savings account at the nearest Al Kuraimi Bank branch or office, which are spread all over Yemeni Governorates and subscribing to the service to be right beside you.
 
Kuraimi Jawal: your Bank in your mobile phone.

title: DayPay - Payday loans and Cash advance
description:
Get payday loans online in minutes. DayPay application is designed specifically to make the process of finding loans easier. This app makes it possible get cash advance anytime and anywhere.

When you are faced with an unexpected expense and need to borrow money it is important that you find the right type of loan for you and one that you can afford.
Online loans include several types of loans and are distinguished by their speed and convenience. To get loan online, it is enough to have access to the Internet and meet the basic requirements (age, income, etc).
Payday loans can be used for almost any expense - from paying off credit cards to financing home improvements, small business or even a much-needed vacation. Online personal loans can be a convenient alternative to bank loans or high-interest credit cards, with online request forms and hassle-free automated repayment.

You can apply for advance loan online whether you are at home or on the go.
1. Fill out simple form - It takes only a few minutes to complete.
2. Get offers from lenders - The process is completely online.
3. Check your account - Receive your money straight to your bank account.

Advance money before payday
One of the main reasons borrowers choose to apply online is because they usually receive a decision instantly with minimal hassle. Personal loan could help you regain control of your financial situation and could allow you to avoid late payment penalties or bounced check fees.
If you are in need of quick cash, look no farther than this loan app. It's easy and it's OK if you have bad credit, DayPay may be able to connect you with reputable lenders that can help. Our process is free to use and will not negatively impact your credit. 

Whether you are looking for a payday loan, cash advance or installment loan, it's our main goal to help you find best loan option.

Material disclosure
DayPay is not a lender or a loan broker and does not make credit decisions. This application connects consumers who are looking for financial assistance with independent, qualified lenders who may be able to provide a loan. This application does not constitute an offer or solicitation for loan products which are prohibited by any state law. You are under no obligation to use this app to initiate contact with a lender, apply for credit or any loan product, or accept a loan from a lender.

Minimum and maximum period for repayment - from 65 days to 2 years.

The APR is the rate at which your loan accrues interest and is based upon the amount, cost and term of your loan, repayment amounts and timing of payments. Some states have laws limiting the APR that a lender can charge you. APRs range from 4.99% up to 36% and vary by lender. Lenders are legally required to show you the APR and other terms of your loan before you execute a loan agreement.

Residents of some states may not be eligible for some loans. Residents of Arkansas, Connecticut, New Hampshire, New York, Montana, South Dakota, Vermont, West Virginia, Indiana and Minnesota are not eligible to use this app or service.

Representative example of the total cost of the loan (including all applicable fees)
Loan amount - $1500. Loan term - 1 year. APR - 7%.
Your monthly repayment will be $129.64.
The total amount repayable will be $1555.70, therefore the loan will cost you $55.70

title: Coast360 Federal Credit Union
description:
Bank at your leisure with Coast Mobile, the official app from Coast360 Federal Credit Union. Access an array of banking services from wherever you are, whenever you want.

FEATURES:

Login safe and secure with touch ID. 

View Accounts
View your transactions, account balances and history up to the last 6 months. You can also search for transactions by keyword or amount in the Account screen.

Transfer funds
Transfer money between your accounts in a snap. Make sure you have all the funds you need in your debit card to make those last minute purchases. You can even transfer funds to another member of Coast360 at no charge. All you’ll need is their member number, last name and share ID. 

Coast eDeposit(1)
Remotely deposit your check with Coast eDeposit! Just snap a photo of your check to deposit into your Checking account. Checks are processed within 24-48 hours, but may be held for up to 10 business days.

SendMoney(2)
Send money to virtually anywhere in the world from your mobile device. Send your funds safely and securely to anyone with a PayPal account using their phone or email address. SendMoney is a feature powered by PayPal.

Coast ePay
Never stand in line again with Coast ePay, Coast360’s bill pay system. Enroll in Coast Online to set up your payees and be able to pay for your bills from anywhere. This feature requires a checking account.

Rates
Access all our latest share and loan rates with just a few simple taps.

PLUS, access more time-saving links to locate member centers and ATMs, hours of operation and more.

To access Coast360’s mobile banking app, you must be enrolled with Coast Online. Transfer and deposit limitations apply. Read the Coast Online/Coast Mobile Disclosure & Agreement for full details. 
(1) Checking account (open for at least 90 days) is required to use Coast eDeposit. Checks deposited through Coast eDeposit must be endorsed with “For Coast eDeposit only”. Refer to Coast Mobile FAQs for other terms and conditions. (2) Coast360 does not make any warranties and is not responsible for any transactions conducted through PayPal. The SendMoney service requires you to accept terms and conditions of a separate agreement. See the Coast Mobile FAQ at www.coast360fcu.com for full details.

While Coast360 members may use Coast Mobile at no charge, your wireless provider’s messaging and data rates may apply.  Some features are available for eligible members and accounts only.

Coast360’s mobile banking is safe and secure as Coast Mobile uses TLS (Transport Layer Security) encryption to communicate securely through all mobile service providers. Security measures block unauthorized access and protect your data, no matter how you access your accounts.

Feedback?  We love to hear your feedback as it helps us improve our mobile banking app.  To share your feedback and/or suggestions, email us at contactcenter@coast360fcu.com.

(1) Checking account (open for at least 90 days) is required to use Coast eDeposit. Checks deposited through Coast eDeposit must be endorsed with “For Coast eDeposit only”. Refer to Coast Mobile FAQs for other terms and conditions. (2) Coast360 does not make any warranties and is not responsible for any transactions conducted through PayPal. The SendMoney service requires you to accept terms and conditions of a separate agreement. See the Coast Mobile FAQ at www.coast360fcu.com for full details.

While Coast360 members may use Coast Mobile at no charge, your wireless provider’s messaging and data rates may apply. Some features are available for eligible members and accounts only.

Coast360’s mobile banking is safe and secure as Coast Mobile uses TLS (Transport Layer Security) encryption to communicate securely through all mobile service providers. Security measures block unauthorized access and protect your data, no matter how you access your accounts.

Feedback? We love to hear your feedback as it helps us improve our mobile banking app. To share your feedback and/or suggestions, email us at contactcenter@coast360fcu.com.
summary: Coast360 FCU’s Mobile Banking App – Coast Mobile - for Android devices

Before I was able to transfer money between my accounts but recently am not able to. It tells me to enter an amount after I already have. Now I have to go to the bank or an ATM to do so. What's the point of having the app???
Device not Authorized. It used to work until my S9+ updated. Now it keeps saying device unauthorized.
my experience for this apps is that it very helpful in checking my balances it helps me to know how to spend and to manage my money so
Hopefully they fix the "Device not Authorized" issue when phones are updated

title: My Income - Overview of Your Expenses & Income
description:
Finance tracker made simple. My Income helps you easily see all your budget and money in one place. Keep track of all your cash, bank accounts, investments, salaries and enter your daily/monthly etc. expenses to see a simple overview of how much you earn daily/monthly/yearly.

No more complex and difficult budget tracking apps. My Income lets you see overview of your finances simpler & clearer. Just insert data of all your incomes and expenses and see if you're behind or ahead of your budget.

► Ads Free
► Data is your property - offline app without any trackers
► Supports different currencies 200+
► Built in App lock to secure all your data from strangers eyes
► Track your investments with annual return % calculation
► Calculate financial independence - early retirement (FIRE)
► See income vs expenses in chart
► Transfer balance between accounts

My Income is in early development so expect new features coming soon!

To leave feedback or request a feature use Send Feedback option in settings or write to ninthfi@gmail.com 

All feedback is greatly appreciated!

comments: This app saves me so much time going in to the bank. I can do everything right from the app. When they say free checking, its free checking. I do wish there were more locations thru out Oregon. But im very happy banking here. You can save money on all types of insurance to. So join me and become a member.
Deposit camera frame is terrible. I have to take it over and over again because there are no parameters showing what's in and out of the frame.
Well when my local ATM is always not working I learned how to use the app to deposit checks, I love it!!!
Great way to manage and access accounts on the fly! The E-deposit is foolproof and expedient, and overall the app is well put together and user-friendly.

This app has been so helpful for me! It's easy to use and super convenient! Don't have time to drive across town? Do you need to deposit a check? Just sign it, take a couple pictures and by 3pm your deposit has been made. Need to transfer money from savings to checking? Takes less than a minute. Seriously, I timed myself.

title: Citibanamex Móvil
description:
Citibanamex Móvil es tu sucursal móvil. Entendemos tus necesidades y actualizamos constantemente las funcionalidades para hacer tu vida financiera más fácil y práctica.

•	Regístrate fácilmente con tu número de cliente o de tarjeta de crédito.
•	Activa tu huella o el reconocimiento facial para iniciar sesión.
•	Crea y modifica el NIP de todas tus tarjetas.
•	Activa y bloquea temporalmente tus tarjetas, y si lo necesitas, repórtalas por robo o extravío.
•	Consulta el saldo y movimientos de todas tus cuentas.
•	Haz transferencias al banco que tú quieras y a la hora que lo necesites. ¡Sin comisiones!
•	Paga tus tarjetas de crédito, departamentales, servicios e impuestos del SAT.
•	Guarda dinero en tu cuenta de Inversión. Es una opción segura que no se muestra en el saldo del cajero automático.
•	Elige el límite de gastos de tus tarjetas para tener un control de tus finanzas.
•	Localiza el cajero o la sucursal más cercana.
•	Encuentra promociones exclusivas con tus tarjetas.
•	Comienza a invertir en Pagaré sin acudir a sucursal, solo necesitas tenerlo contratado.
•	Consulta el resumen de Créditos Personales y de Nómina.

Download it
recentChanges:
• Haz transferencias y pagos al instante.
• Si tienes un Pagaré contratado, puedes invertir y recibir la inversión final en tu cuenta.
• Aumentamos la seguridad. Tu cuenta está vinculada con tu dispositivo, solo verifica tu celular y todas tus operaciones estarán protegidas.

comments: Unreliable. Sometimes the app work fine, then the next day you can't connect to the servers. This is a problem with the app, because going to Bancanet from the browser works perfectly. I suggest people to use the website as a backup to the app, because while the website works fine, the app is easier to use on a phone.

[Update 3/21/20] Considerably better after recent updates! The fingerprint scanner works as expected, and they added virtual cards for use w/online payments--which I appreciate. Only thing keeping this from getting 5 stars is that you still have to physically go to the bank to get your Netkey which is very inconvenient. Double so because the app is not worth using w/o the Netkey. Still, once you get it it's pretty close to the apps from the other banks. Main thing missing for me is the ability to generate a 1 time code to withdraw cash from ATMs w/o using your debit card. Removing 1 start because their customer service is mediocre. Having to wait 20 minutes to call back because the app was apparently logged in is ridiculous.

Too many times and too often is asking to verify the cell phone number registered, its very annoing and after entering the cell phone # I can't use the app for some time and sometimes its urgent to check my balance. Please correct this! Don't say its for my own security, this procedure is above other apps average
Very useful app... But fails often. I assume that's because some functions require open banks or something.

It won't display your numbers till past 24 hours. Horrible bank charges you for past debts like days or weeks after. It doesn't let you authenticate in the app ..you need to waste your time hours and hours in the bank....it sucks

title: Simplifi: Money Management
description:
Simplifi by Quicken helps you effortlessly manage all of your finances in one place and make your hard-earned money work harder for you.

Simplifi by Quicken makes it easy to customize and track your budget, manage spending, and reach your financial goals with one personalized, use-anywhere app

EASILY ORGANIZE YOUR MONEY
* Automatically connect with and view all financial accounts in one place so you know exactly where you stand.
* Effortlessly identify changes in spending, income, net worth, and more so you know you’re on the right track.

SET & ACHIEVE PERSONALIZED GOALS
Whether you’re saving for your dream home, a vacation, retirement, or your child’s education, Simplifi helps you achieve life’s most important milestones.

TRACK SPENDING & BUDGET WITH CONFIDENCE
* Feel confident that you are covered to spend on the things you care about.
* Create a simple budget based on your income and bills to make sure you aren’t spending more than you make in a month.
* Categorize and monitor spending so you can get and stay ahead.

LEARN KEY SPENDING & SAVING INSIGHTS
* Discover key insights so that you can make decisions that matter to you.
* See how much money you have spent this month, excluding bills and subscriptions, so you know if you can spend or need to cut back.

SECURITY
We’re serious about protecting your account and privacy. Visit https://www.quicken.com/privacy/us to learn more.

PRIVACY
If you are a California resident, please refer to the new privacy guidelines set forth by The California Consumer Privacy Act on information sharing. If you would like to opt-out of the sale of your personal information as defined by these new guidelines, please go to http://www.quicken.com/privacy.

recentChanges: Bug fixes including a fix for scenarios where transactions appeared to be missing.
comments: So far I really like this app. I used Mint for a long time as well as another financial app. The Ads for Mint is so annoying and it's configurable options are limited. The other app had a good UI but a very limited mobile app. Sync with Simplify is seamless and the mobile app is very user friendly. The Web UI makes this a complete financial app. The only part that's lacking is itemization for investments.
This app doubles many of the transactions, making the dashboard a complete nightmare. No easy way to mark duplicates. It's much worse at everything than Mint.
Improving capabilities more and more. Really like the ability to manage recurring bills and income, which helps predict cash flow.

This app could be so good. Lots of potential. It looks great, pretty easy to use. But, There's no customization for the dashboard. I don't want to see my spending year to date I want to see this months spending! It will not let you change anything on the dashboard. Lots of unhelpful information. Plus, my net income is wrong. Idk what is wrong with it but it is missing expenses and all of my accounts are linked to it. A real shame bc the app is very aestheticly pleasing.

This app is very useful, especially if you have lot different banks and saving account to keep track on... im actually was surprise how many useful features, such as making saving goals💵, shows me my top spending graph 😱💸, how to reduce my financial spending and so much more. Plus, the pricing for premium isnt ridiculously expensive, so far its worth it, I really recommend this app.

title: Charlie - Budget, Save, Earn
description:
Charlie is a FREE smart, friendly penguin who worries about money, so you don’t have to. He’s a personal assistant for your money, who works for you 24/7. 


CHARLIE’S FEATURES INCLUDE

▶ Money-saving ideas every day
▶ Insights into your daily, weekly, and monthly spending habits so you can spend smarter
▶ Cutting your bills, whether it’s Netflix, Comcast, or the New York Times subscription. 
▶ Overdraft alerts
▶ Penguin gifs. Lots of them. 
& more


FEATURED IN

▶ PC World: “The convenience of Charlie is immediately apparent. Rather than having to log into my bank’s website or budgeting app to check recent activity or run a report, I could just pull out my phone and ask.”
▶ The Penny Hoarder: “Charlie’s messages have made me more aware of what’s going on with my money on a daily and weekly basis. And as long as he’s around, I feel like there will be fewer financial surprises in my life.”
▶ BadCredit.org: “The Friendly Chatbot penguin helps consumers manage finances, eliminate frivolous spending, and work towards savings goals.”

RATED 5 STARS ON TRUSTPILOT

▶ Caitlin: “I always thought I was good at monitoring my accounts through online banking, but lately I keep getting slapped with overdraft and returned item fees. It’s infuriating! So I got some help from Charlie. I mean who wouldn’t love to see that adorable little guy pop up with new messages, updating you on your balances, new transactions, etc.”
▶ Samantha: “I really enjoy Charlie and all his features! Fun, interactive, accurate and much faster to update me than competitors.”


PRICE

Charlie is 100% free and always has been.  


SECURITY

Charlie is devoted to protecting your money and privacy. We use the same 256-bit SSL encryption that banks use and insist on encryption for all connections. This means that all data transfers are protected from unauthorized access using the most advanced cryptographic algorithms available.
We never store your login information in any form and we’ll never sell any of your information.

summary: Your money-saving prodigy penguin
recentChanges:
Fixing bugs is a super easy way to save money! Oh, wait a minute...maybe not. But I fixed lots of them, just for you.

Find a bug I missed? Some bugs can be more slippery than a penguin on ice. Let me know about it at support@hicharlie.com.
comments: This app is great for organizing your budget but there are times when the system doesnt calculate or take all the transactions into place. For instance I saved money this past month and Charlie told me that I didnt save any money. Theres also times when I get payed and it doesnt take that into account. Dont get me wrong I love this app I just feel it can do a bit better in reading all the transactions

This app is great! Only, minor, complaint I have is with the adding bills to the budgetary. I wish there was a way to edit the frequency of bills. I have a bill that I get charged once a week for and another bill that I only get charged every 3 months for. However, the app just assumes that every bill is charged once a month.

I used the messanger app quite a bit, but since installing the actual app, the app doesn't work unless whitelist many tracking domains on my Pi-Hole. If Charlie is FREE and privacy focused why all the trackers?? The app doesn't even work without them. Sounds like once again, my data is the product here. Uninstalling and definitely not recommending to anyone. EDIT: no bug, dev. The app works fine outside my local network that isn't block trackers. Home network w/ DNS tracking disabled it doesn't.

I registered for this service a few years ago on Facebook but never used it. I downloaded the app and decided to give Charlie a chance and he's helpful! What I would love to see more of is to analyze and locate weird purchases or amounts and then ask me about these. Potentially there could be charges from who knows when and if he found something like that for me that'd be Charlie's best feature. I've saw nothing super useful thus far but this service has great potential!

Wish charlie was better are bargaining/reducing bills, fees, and expenses. Would be AMAZING if he was able to negotiate bank fees, try to get them reimbursed. Also, another great feature would be helping with mortgage stuff. Lowering interest rates, negotiating late fees, or maybe if he could give advice like resources for home owners, grants, solar power, ways to get assistance with monthly payments. Tax credits,exemptions Or saving on home/auto insurance without going to a scammy website.

title: Payday Loans GO - Find quick loan
descriptionHTML:
Payday loans are loans that provide borrowers with quick cash advance. Since these loans are available to consumers regardless of their credit scores, they will not have to deal with the hassle of a credit check in order to get funds.Our payday loans matching service can approve your request for few minutes and give your lenders link! The process is incredibly fast and far less frustrating than attempting to obtain credit from traditional lenders. Our lenders can help customers obtain as much as $1,000 depending on the lender, state and financial situation.

• Borrow up to $1000
• Speedy cash
• Consumer finance loans
• Fast installments or payday loans
• No hassle, bad credit OK
• Cash advance in your account today
• Instant payday loan decision
• Fast & easy approval;
• No long forms;
• No credit check, no teletrack payday loans;
• No faxing 100 percent online payday loan;
• Confidential & Secure;
• Flexible payment options;
• Reliable customer service

Installment loan is a medium term loan with a fixed interest rate that is repaid in equal monthly payments and it’s usually cash advance limited to 24 months. Loan offers and eligibility depend on individual credit profile. Our lenders can help customers obtain as much as $3,000 depending on a particular lender, state and financial situation. Installment loans are affordable alternatives to payday loans, but at the same time installment loan lenders have higher qualifications. Download the app and get payday loans! Easy, quick and fast




Legal Info

Minimum and maximum period for repayment - precise your lende and in range from 65 days to 2 years.

APR Disclosure. Some states have laws limiting the APR that a lender can charge you. APRs range from 200% and 1386%. Loans from a state that has no limiting laws or loans from a bank not governed by state laws may have an even higher APR. The Annual Percentage Rate is the rate at which your loan accrues interest and is based upon the amount, cost and term of your loan, repayment amounts and timing of payments. Lenders are legally required to show you the APR and other terms of your loan before you execute a loan agreement.
summary: Payday Loans GO - Find quick loan
recentChanges: Release Payday Loans Go - Find quick loan
comments: Very convenient and easy to use mobile loan software. Small loans are very convenient. There are many loan companies. The loan speed is also very fast.
i was having problems getting a loan, application after application. good user interface. i have already my experience with my friends. cash was speedy. love these people.
This was the best loan application experience. Have bank info and employers phine number handy. Would recommend them to anyone that would listen!
Wow! The small loan is really messy. Very helpful staff, I would recommend..

I was very happy with how fast I received my loan. Had a moment with one conversation where the rep wasn't very knowledgeable however questions were resolved after seeking new rep. I'm desperate for help and I have bad credit. Easy process, clear understanding of terms and payment details. Customer support is amazing as well.

title: GivePlus
description:
With GivePlus, you can use your mobile device to make secure, convenient one-time or recurring donations to any church that uses Vanco Payment Solutions. Simply search GivePlus for the church you want to give to, select a fund and the amount you’d like to donate, provide your credit or debit card information, and complete your donation. Plus, you can choose to create a password then easily log in with your email address to make additional donations, manage recurring donations and review your GivePlus donation history.

GivePlus allows you to: 

•	Quickly and easily give to your church via smartphone
•	Set up recurring or one-time donations
•	Choose whether to log in or donate as a guest 
•	Securely and conveniently manage your donations using TouchID, PIN, or password

comments: This app once worked great, but it seems the only thing it can do is delete things. I try to make a donation, everything appears to be correct, I exit the app and login again and nothing is there. There is never has been indication that anything is OK, or wrong. You can only wait and if the correct withdrawals are being made for your accounts. There is no method of communicating with Vanco, other than posting reviews like this.

Basic, but it does the job. Receipt is only sent if I register and log in. I need to enter my login every time. Basic look and feel. It did work, and I did not run into the stoppages or other issues that some users described.

I would love to use this app to donate to my church especially with social distancing due to COVID-19. However, the reviews make me very uncomfortable placing my financial information in this app. In addition there is no ability to utilize Android or Apple pay. Are there any plans to add this functionality in the near future?
No record of transactions. I submitted a donation to our local church and received no email confirmation nor record of it within the app. Unacceptable.
I don't remember my password it will not send me a way to reset my password. I put in my email address but have not received instructions on how to reset. Very annoying.

title: Uphold: buy and sell Bitcoin
description:
We make it easy to buy, sell and ‘send’ any major digital or national currency. You can choose between 30 cryptos, 27 traditional currencies and four precious metals. 

We’ve introduced commission-free trading to make crypto more affordable. Our digital money app now features ‘Anything-to-Anything’ trading that means you can convert directly from any asset into any other - XRP to DASH, for example - in one step. On other platforms, this would involve two separate trades and fees. 

    • 0% Trading commissions, credit/debit card fees, withdrawal fees 
    • 27 National currencies
    • 30 Cryptocurrencies and Utility Tokens
    • 4 Metals
    • 35+ Countries with bank connectivity 

What’s more, you can send any currency to virtually anyone, anywhere, instantly - and free of charge.

We have nearly 1.7 million members who have performed more than US$6bn in transactions with us.

Buy and Sell Currencies
From Bitcoin to Euro, trade 50+ of the most important national and digital currencies, instantly and commission-free. 

0% deposits and withdrawals
Link your US or EEA bank account, credit & debit cards or private wallets on seven cryptocurrency networks to deposit and withdraw funds.

Guaranteed prices pre-trade
Our prices are locked at Preview stage meaning the price you see is the all-inclusive price you pay.

Be Smart with Total Trackability
Easily navigate your portfolio, prices and transactions in real time with charts, tickers and detailed account history.

Withdrawal funds to your private wallets on up to 7 crypto networks, or to your bank accounts in almost 40 countries
Transact with any wallet on the following crypto crypto networks: Bitcoin, XRP Ledger, Litecoin, Ethereum, Dash, Bitcoin Cash, Bitcoin Gold.

Send money to friends and family
Virtually anyone, anywhere can receive funds instantly and free of charge. You choose the currency you want to send, they get the currency they need.

Trust Through Transparency
Uphold is fully reserved. Unlike banks, we don’t loan out your money. To prove it, we publish our holdings in real time.

TrustPilot Reviews

summary: Go from Dollar to Bitcoin in seconds, stress free (1,000+ other currency pairs).
recentChanges: It’s now easier for you to manage your portfolio. We’ve improved our graphs for you to better understand the trends.
comments: I have been using this service for over a year and everything was perfect. My documents were checked and everything was ok with my account.But about a week ago, I wanted to buy bitcoin via a bank account. I linked it through plaid to the uphold account. This is safe and cool. After a day, money is debited from the bank account and immediately block my uphold account! IMMEDIATELY! They do not respond to a request to return my money back. Very similar to SCAM.

Why does the mobile app for my smart phone work better than the same app on my Samsung Tab 4. I have been working on the Tab 4 and the fonts get in the way of my input on the transact line/lines. I want to know why you need 2FA when there are times I sign in on my Tab 4 and you want me to verify again by sending a code to my email. I may have signed in a couple of days before on the same device.

The app is a lot better now so I'm giving it 3 starts. However it still needs some work, the app should have the same menu options like the website. Please keep working on it to make it better. After the updates I'm now opening it more often now.

not user-friendly.. not easy to understand how to transfer crypto.. you could have made it with the usual send/recieve;copypaste; withdraw/deposit. you don't need innovation when it comes to money transfer because a single mistake is equivalent to losing money. you need to revert the transaction to usual crypto transaction. until then i consider reinstalling.. so for now, sorry to uninstall this useless app.. thanks!

Wow this app has come a long way since the beginning! The UI has been revamped and is now much easier to navigate. I'm super happy that debit card support is available now so I can transfer funds instantly! The ability to exchange crypto with real-world currencies on the fly is just absolutely awesome! I haven't experienced any bugs or issues so I hope it's smooth sailing from here :)

title: EasyTithe Giving
description:
Giving to your church or organization has never been easier.


Save card details to your account to make it even easier. All account info is fully integrated with your online giving, text giving, kiosk giving, and all other easyTithe modules.


The easyTithe app is free to use for all donors and churches. No upsells, no in app purchases.
descriptionHTML:
Giving to your church or organization has never been easier.


Save card details to your account to make it even easier. All account info is fully integrated with your online giving, text giving, kiosk giving, and all other easyTithe modules.


The easyTithe app is free to use for all donors and churches. No upsells, no in app purchases.
summary: Easily give and view your giving history via the EasyTithe Giving App.
recentChanges:
-Fix for Giving connection issue that occurred with older Android phones.
-General small optimizations.
comments: Simple and Easy to use. And when I made I mistake on which category I was sending my donation, easytithe updated the label within the hour of my request. Note: I had already called the receiving organization to make sure they understood my mistake.
Worked well for a while then it stopped letting me log in. I had to find my church each time and request a new password.. Can no longer trust this app. I will be uninstalling it
Keeps giving me an error message after I enter all my info and donation. It comes up right after I click Give. Can you fix it, please?
This differently makes it easier to give tithes, offerings, and help financially with your local church. I do wish the history would go back further, though. Thank you for the great app.

this is a terrible app! it doesn't recognize my password majority of the time. on the very rare occasions I can finally get into my account it gives me no option to change my giving amount or dates. no way to delete the account. I recommend not downloading this out

title: Bristol West Insurance
description:
Manage your auto insurance easily with the Bristol West® Mobile App. Popular features include viewing ID cards, making payments, viewing Policy information, reporting claims, and more.

Here’s what you can do:
•    Review your bills, make payments and manage payment methods.
•    Access ID cards for your auto policies.
•    View Policy information.
•    Find contact information for your agent. 

It’s easy to use the Bristol West Mobile App. Logging in is hassle-free with or there’s even a “Remember Me” feature that can recognize your phone or mobile device after you’ve used it to sign in.



Disclosures: 
Bristol West Insurance Group® insurance policies are underwritten by the following companies, depending on the state: Bristol West Insurance Company; Bristol West Casualty Insurance Company; Bristol West Preferred Insurance Company; Bristol West Specialty Insurance Company; Coast National Insurance Company; Foremost County Mutual Insurance Company; Foremost Insurance Company  Grand Rapids, Michigan; Foremost Signature Insurance Company; Security National Insurance Company.

Home office: Los Angeles, CA. 

Each insurer has sole financial responsibility for its own insurance. List of all insurers at bristolwest.com/home/terms. Not all insurers are authorized in all states. Not all products, coverages, and discounts are available in every state and may vary by state. Restrictions, exclusions, limits, and conditions apply. See agent for details.

Thank you for using the Bristol West Mobile App.

comments: Still says error retrieving policy info. All my login info and my security questions are correct so it's not that. Please fix so I can use the app instead of going through google. The online site isnt user friendly and I still don't have access to my documents as soon as Esigned. Thank you. I'll re rate once i can login.

I'm not sure why so many negative comments. Maybe it's the type/model of your phone or your phone settings. I have an Android, Samsung Note 8, and I love the app. I've logged in five times and flipped through my documents and it is perfect!!!
Cannot view my ID card when I click on it. I don't know if you're the same people that run the actual website but can't even do it on a computer. It downloads a stupid illegible text document.

Wont let me login at all. It just keeps saying error retrieving my policy info. That's after I login and answer the security question, then brings me back to the login screen. I try the website and it doesnt do anything either.

I tried over and over to log in and it says invalid credentials. So i called customer service and they asked for my e-mail and password to which i gave it to them and they said it was right. Then i even had them log in with no success. So i change it and the same thing, I have never been so pissed about a login in my life I pay too much for your service to not be able to check stuff on your app. Fix it please!!! Ridiculous

comments: I was unable to add my debit card in this app, and it kept telling me there was some kind of a problem for a quite durable time. I then contacted the developers and they, being amazingly calm, promised me to fix the problem. So they did, and very soon indeed, thanks) I think every app needs such good workers in their feedback service team.

It is very convenient for me to use this app because I can borrow money for a short time just when I need it. I can also connect this app to my financial accounts and see information on my cards. But it happened a few times that I have completed a financial operation, but the system didn’t show any income of money for about hours. That is the only bug I have noticed so far.

I was disappointed when I tried to download this app and it took almost like forever for the app to be installed. I had to be REALLY patient to wait for it to finally open. But I changed my opinion on the subject after using this service for a while. The app is operating very well and boots up quickly. All the disadvantages are gone. Developers did a good job here!

It is really easy to access my accounts, take loans and pay them off. I find the interface very convenient, too. It doesn’t take long to find the info you are looking for or to find and set up a certain option. I got hold of the ways things work here in only a few minutes after opening the app. It always provides me with money when I need it the most!

It's a free app with good service. It has recommendations for your loans and transactions, notifies you about all the updates and shows info on your connected cards. And as I am a type of person who always forgets about all the important things one has to do, a service that has such functions is very convenient for me to use)

However, when you're looking for an online quote from a certain service, as soon as you complete the form, you will be absolutely relentlessly bombarded with auto dialed calls. This is very inconvenient if you are in a work setting or a place where this is inconvenient

I love this app!! The money is always there when I need it. The support chat is great very little waiting for a response, and issue was resolved quickly. If your looking for a reliable app when your low on dough, this is it. The payments are automatically withdrawn from my account, and within 2 day O can borrow again if I need to. I love it!!

So awesome! Honestly I was pretty sceptical at first, but this app has helped so much!!! It's really amazing, and 10 billion times better than a Payday loan. I love that we pay what we think is fair, I love the community. I have rarely had any issues, but the few times I do, I've been able to chat with support through the app, and they never fail to impress me. title: DTA Connect
description:
Track your benefits in a few clicks – no more long lines and hold times. Get case updates, appointment reminders, update your contact information, upload documents, check your EBT balance and more from the Massachusetts Department of Transitional Assistance (DTA).
 
To log-in you must have an Active or Pending case with DTA. If you recently applied, your case information will be available within 7 business days.
 
Please email dtaapphelpdesk@state.ma.us with your Agency ID if you have issues with the DTA Connect app.

comments: It would be really great if, when I open a document from the activity page, the doc actually opened... Like it is supposed to/used to do just fine. In reality, it says the server can't process request, and then logs me out! It's really inconvenient, and kind of upsetting. This has been happening for months! Please make this problem better, so I can use the app again.

Everytime I put my ss# and year of birth to login, the screen on my phone says, " Unable to connect to server." I don't understand what happened, it was working 2 days ago, I have uninstalled this app several times, then reinstalled it, but it says the same thing when I put my information in!!! So right now I am not giving this a good review until it gets fixed!!!
The app never works. I get the spinning circle then get an error message saying cannot connect to server.

One star cause you can see your balance. I'd add 2 more if I could get a real time transaction list. If you guys added all that and for us to be able to fill out forms through the app instead of using the dated mail system I'd definitely give you 5 stars. Heck I'll give you another star right now if you can make the app not crash when I go to look at my docs. It use to work.
The app used to work, but hasn't for ANYONE for months and they have done nothing to fix it!

title: US Stock Market - Live Quote
description:
It is the best stock market app to track US Stocks and east to manage your portfolios anytime and anywhere. It synchronizes with real-time streaming data, allows quick access to stick stock quotes, detail data stock, charts and let you view the latest stock news. App covers stocks and indices including DOW Jones, NYSE exchange,  Nasdaq exchange and OTC markets, so that you can track all Indices and stocks from US Exchange Markets.

♡ Features :
✔ Real time Prices of US Stocks.
✔ Stocks News and Chart
✔ Streaming Price on Watchlist and Stock Detail Page.
✔ Key Details Of Stock: Such as Market Capital, PE Ration, Dividend Yield , Market Capital , Day Low, Day High , Year Low, Year High , Open and Previous Close, etc.
✔ Track the profits from the list of your portfolios.
✔ Support Dow Jones Industrial Average, NASDAQ Composite and S&P 500 stock indices.
✔ Financial websites are provided for user to browse the stock information.
✔ Major Stock Indexes in the World are provided.
✔ Ability to search and add the stocks in stock list.

title: Banco Agrario App
description:
En el Banco Agrario de Colombia queremos hacer más fácil el manejo de sus productos financieros, por eso ponemos a su servicio diferentes canales de atención para que usted realice  sus operaciones de manera fácil y segura.

Descargue gratis Banco Agrario App en su celular y estaremos al alcance de su mano. 

Realice consultas de saldos y movimientos de sus productos, haga transferencias entre cuentas del Banco Agrario de Colombia, haga retiros de efectivo sin utilizar tarjeta débito, a través de un pin de seguridad; consulte las oficinas y cajeros más cercanos a su ubicación, reciba notificaciones sobre novedades de productos, y mucho más.
