comments: ¿Qué pasó con Movicuenta? Estamos próximos a recibir los incentivos de jóvenes en acción y la bloquean.
Llevo casi dos horas intentado crear una movi cuenta pero es imposible, ¿alguna solución?
Pésima error obteniendo las preguntas y no deja responder las preguntas de seguridad

Asco de aplicación, por favor mejoren la, no se puede crear cuenta, no se puede ver información, los teléfonos no contestan, Si hubiese una calificación por debajo de una estrella por mi madre que se las daría. Gracias por arruinar mi vida.

Hoy debo hacer mi inscripcion a movicuenta para recibir el incentivo de Jovenes en accion. Y esa aplicacion no me ayuda para nada. El icono de Movicuenta aparece bloqueado. Muy mala... consigan buenos programadores para hacerla.

title: Pushpay
description:
With Pushpay® you can easily and quickly donate to a charity or give to your church.

Pushpay® is simple, secure and very quick.

Select who you want to give to, how much you want to send them, authorize your payment and that’s it, transaction complete!

• Set up different payment methods, credit cards, debit cards or direct bank transfer. 
• Enter your payment details once when setting up the account, then push pay to make a transaction securely in seconds; you are in complete control of the payment process.
• Secure payments and access to your account with either passcode or a fingerprint.
• Works with all credit and debit cards including Visa, MasterCard, AMEX and Discover. 
• Pay direct from your bank account for supported merchants.
• Pushpay® is fully secure and PCI compliant. All transactions require a passcode or fingerprint and if you lose your phone you can freeze your account.
• Other features include viewing your recent transactions, updating your details (including credit/debit card) and being able to deauthorize a device.

title: BBVA México (Bancomer Móvil)
description:
BBVA Bancomer ahora es BBVA ¡Bienvenido a nuestra nueva aplicación para sistemas operativos Android 5 o superior! 

En BBVA México, todos tus datos y cuentas están protegidos. 

Con ella podrás consultar todas tus cuentas y hacer tus operaciones cuando y donde quieras. Si aún no eres cliente BBVA, no te preocupes, abre tu cuenta desde tu celular sin costo ni comisiones.

¿Qué puedo hacer con BBVA México?

¿Se te olvidó tu tarjeta? ¡No pasa nada! 
Saca dinero del cajero usando solo tu celular o envía dinero a tus contactos para que lo tengan disponible de forma inmediata. Genera un código único desde BBVA México y retira utilizando la opción Retiro sin tarjeta en cualquiera de nuestros cajeros. 

Saberse el número de cuenta es tema del pasado. Con BBVA México transfiere sin números de cuenta
¡Ahora solo necesitas un código QR que podrás generar dentro de tu aplicación! Además puedes pagar con tu celular en algunos establecimientos leyendo desde tu app el código que te proporcionen. 

¿Es el último día para hacer tus pagos? Con BBVA México ya no hay nada de cortes inesperados.
Paga tu crédito al consumo, luz, gas, teléfono, tiendas departamentales, internet y más sin salir de casa. 

¿Otra vez te quedaste sin saldo? ¡No vayas a la tienda!
Compra tiempo aire donde quiera que estés o recarga el cel de alguien más.

¿Micro infarto porque no encuetras tu tarjeta? ¡Mejor apágala!
Desde tu app encontrarás la opción de apagado para prevenir que hagan mal uso de ella y encenderla cuando la hayas encontrado.

Y si detectas un cargo que no reconoces, ¡no necesitas llamar!
Si el cargo es menor a $500 MN podrás hacer la reclamación desde tu app y tener el abono en línea, de inmediato.

¿Ocupado conduciendo? Ahora ejecuta con tu voz
Blue, asistente virtual que te ayuda con tus consultas y transferencias por voz o texto

¿Ya te diste cuenta de cuál es le mejor nómina?
¡Cámbiate a BBVA desde tu app y disfruta de todas las ventajas! Tu empresa te seguirá depositando tu sueldo en la  misma cuenta y de ahí se transferirá automáticamente a tu cuenta en BBVA.

¿Necesitas una cuenta adicional a la tuya?
No importa si eres cliente BBVA  o no, puedes abrir una cuenta desde tu celular cuando la necesites y sin acudir a sucursal.

Si necesitas un préstamo, ¡nosotros te lo damos! 
Entérate si tienes una oferta disponible y tómala cuando lo necesites desde tu app BBVA México.

Y por último, pero no menos importante...
Consulta el saldo y movimientos de tus cuentas y tarjetas de crédito de BBVA sin tener que acudir a un cajero o sucursal. 
Realiza transferencias y traspasos de dinero entre tus cuentas, otras cuentas BBVA y a otros bancos nacionales SIN COMISIÓN y con total seguridad de que el dinero llegará.


Algo que debes saber …
• Máxima seguridad: los datos de tus operaciones se transmiten protegidos y no se guardan en el celular
• Si extravías tu celular, nadie puede ingresar a tu servicio, pues solo tú conoces la contraseña de acceso y puedes cancelarlo llamando a Línea BBVA
• Podrás usar BBVA México con la misma contraseña del resto de apps de BBVA

Para activar el servicio, ten a la mano tu tarjeta de débito o crédito y tu Token si cuentas con él

¿Tienes dudas? Línea BBVA (Antes Línea Bancomer)
Área Metropolitana 5226-2663
Interior de la República 01-800-2262663

Nos encanta escucharte y que seas parte de esta app. Si quieres sugerir mejoras, escríbenos a app.bbva.mx@bbva.com.

SI te gusta BBVA México, ayuda a que otros clientes BBVA la conozcan con una reseña de 5 estrellas. ¡Muchas gracias!

¡Todo sin usar tu plan de datos!
- A partir de la versión 10.60 
- Aplica solo para el uso de la app, no aplica para la descarga.
- Es necesario contar con una línea activa perteneciente a las compañías telefónicas participantes.
- Uso dentro del territorio nacional.

recentChanges:
¡Seguimos trabajando para que disfrutes de la mejor Banca Móvil!

No dejes de actualizar, te contamos las novedades de esta versión:

● Ahora puedes ocultar tus productos que no deseas ver en la primer pantalla
● Se corrigen incidencias menores

Nos encanta escucharte y que seas parte de esta app. Para sugerir mejoras, escríbenos a app.bbva.mx@bbva.com.

comments: Every time you update your Android you need to reconfigure everything (since 2017). This does not happens with any other bank in Mexico. Now I'm having issues with the BBVA Token (after I upgraded to Android 10), the app gets stuck trying to reach a server and won't let me sign in to my bank accounts. BBVA support ask me to Uninstall all my from the Bank, now everything is fu*ked. All the apps now open then there's this black screen showing that the Apps have crashed..

This is the worst app in Mexico. On January the system had an error. i always transfer my money by app but on January 7th, I noticed a charger "serv banca internet/ops serv bca in" plus IVA. I'm seeing that the last updated is few days ago. I created an ticket but this bank cannot give me a resolution. Do not create account, ask for loan or credit .. avoid to loose your money without explanation or excuse 😑

The app is stuck in the token activation screen. I keeps sending emails stating that it has been successfully activated without allowing me to access my information. This has been a recurring problem.
It should have access to finger print security access! It is such a deal having to log in.

App stopped working asking/enforcing to configure movile token while i already had it.. tha app was cycled evry try as a result didnt let me log in.... afther some days of frustration decided to reinstall the app ... now during the registration is cycled enforcing to register face recognition even that i don like it, enforces you to do it.. but worst that is cycle all the time .. and still not able to log in...

title: H&R Block Tax Prep and File
description:
Say hello to better tax preparation, expert guidance, upfront pricing, and more ways to file. As the highest-rated tax prep and filing app, it’s easy to see tax prep is better with Block.

Use a different preparer last year? Switch quickly and easily when you file with H&R Block, plus get access to an H&R Block tax expert, enrolled agent, or CPA if you need one. With more than 60 years of tax preparation experience on your side, you can be sure you’re getting your maximum refund -- guaranteed.

More for Free

•	Our H&R Block Free Online tax preparation includes credits and deductions other tax prep services might make you pay for, including student loan interest, tuition and fees, child and dependent care expenses, Social Security income, and unemployment income.
•	Get a free mid-year tax check-in and free audit assistance, part of our No Surprise Guarantee*.
•	If you do want to upgrade to a paid tax prep product, you’ll pay only when you’re ready to file. Prepare your return, get help, and use all app features without paying a dime upfront.


File Your Way

•	Find the product that meets your needs. We’ve got you covered with Free Online, Deluxe Online, Premium Online, and Self-Employed Online tax products without ever leaving the app.
•	H&R Block Online Assist gives you unlimited, on-demand help from an H&R Block tax expert, enrolled agent, or CPA. Whether you’re just starting or almost ready to file, these experts are available at any point in the tax prep process.
•	With Tax Pro Review, a tax pro conducts a line-by-line review of your return, then signs and e-files it. All tax forms are included, so you’ll be able to file for even the most complex credits and deductions. 


Faster Tax Prep

•	With E-File Quick Look, you can get return status updates delivered straight to the Tax Prep App homepage. 
•	Take pics and upload PDFs of your tax docs. Import docs important to you (like last year’s 2018 return, your W-2, or 1099) during tax prep to jump-start your taxes and make filling out forms quick and easy. 
•	Do your taxes on the go, from wherever life takes you. If you’re a returning H&R Block client, sign in with your existing account, and we’ll automatically import all your info from last year’s return. New to Block? Create an account, easily import your last return, and save all your work as you go. 
•	Turn on enhanced two-factor authentication with Google Authenticator when you create or manage your existing account. 

Simple Help

•	One-tap help -- Our Help Center is stocked with answers, advice, and assistance from the best tax preparers in the business -- and it’s just a tap away.
•	Our Secure Messaging makes it easy to ask our tax experts specific questions about your return.  
•	You can prepare and file your 2019 return in-app or sign in on any device to pick up where you left off.


New in 2020

•	Enhanced photo capture experience -- Take a pic of your tax docs, and the H&R Block mobile app will automatically pull in all your info. 
•	Enhanced self-help via search and chatbot -- Tax preparation has never been easier. Search for the help you need, see answers to common tax questions, or talk to our chatbot to get a quick answer to common tax prep and filing questions.
•	Bookmarks -- This new feature makes it easy to save any help article for later. 

Your privacy, security, and guarantees are important to us. Please visit hrblock.com to learn more.
Privacy Policy: https://www.hrblock.com/universal/digital-online-mobile-privacy-principles.html
Service Agreement: https://idp.hrblock.com/idp/Authn/OnlineServiceAgreement.html
Data Security: https://www.hrblock.com/data-security/
Guarantees: https://www.hrblock.com/guarantees/

* Receive 20% off next year’s tax preparation if we fail to provide any of the 4 benefits included in our “No Surprise Guarantee” (Upfront Transparent Pricing, Transparent Process, Free Audit

• Our H&R Block Free Online tax preparation includes credits and deductions other tax prep services might make you pay for, including student loan interest, tuition and fees, child and dependent care expenses, Social Security income, and unemployment income.
• Get a free mid-year tax check-in and free audit assistance, part of our No Surprise Guarantee*.
• If you do want to upgrade to a paid tax prep product, you’ll pay only when you’re ready to file. Prepare your return, get help, and use all app features without paying a dime upfront.


File Your Way

• Find the product that meets your needs. We’ve got you covered with Free Online, Deluxe Online, Premium Online, and Self-Employed Online tax products without ever leaving the app.
• H&R Block Online Assist gives you unlimited, on-demand help from an H&R Block tax expert, enrolled agent, or CPA. Whether you’re just starting or almost ready to file, these experts are available at any point in the tax prep process.
• With Tax Pro Review, a tax pro conducts a line-by-line review of your return, then signs and e-files it. All tax forms are included, so you’ll be able to file for even the most complex credits and deductions.


Faster Tax Prep

• With E-File Quick Look, you can get return status updates delivered straight to the Tax Prep App homepage.
• Take pics and upload PDFs of your tax docs. Import docs important to you (like last year’s 2018 return, your W-2, or 1099) during tax prep to jump-start your taxes and make filling out forms quick and easy.
• Do your taxes on the go, from wherever life takes you. If you’re a returning H&R Block client, sign in with your existing account, and we’ll automatically import all your info from last year’s return. New to Block? Create an account, easily import your last return, and save all your work as you go.
• Turn on enhanced two-factor authentication with Google Authenticator when you create or manage your existing account.

Simple Help

• One-tap help -- Our Help Center is stocked with answers, advice, and assistance from the best tax preparers in the business -- and it’s just a tap away.
• Our Secure Messaging makes it easy to ask our tax experts specific questions about your return.
• You can prepare and file your 2019 return in-app or sign in on any device to pick up where you left off.


New in 2020

• Enhanced photo capture experience -- Take a pic of your tax docs, and the H&R Block mobile app will automatically pull in all your info.
• Enhanced self-help via search and chatbot -- Tax preparation has never been easier. Search for the help you need, see answers to common tax questions, or talk to our chatbot to get a quick answer to common tax prep and filing questions.
• Bookmarks -- This new feature makes it easy to save any help article for later.

Your privacy, security, and guarantees are important to us. Please visit hrblock.com to learn more.

Service Agreement: https://idp.hrblock.com/idp/Authn/OnlineServiceAgreement.html
Data Security: https://www.hrblock.com/data-security/
Guarantees: https://www.hrblock.com/guarantees/

* Receive 20% off next year’s tax preparation if we fail to provide any of the 4 benefits included in our “No Surprise Guarantee” (Upfront Transparent Pricing, Transparent Process, Free Audit
summary: Easily Prepare 2019 Returns

comments: Over all this app is so much easier than all the others and every option it gives you it gives a definition to go along with it. They also so you what you need to look forbid anything is missing or doesn't make sense. This the most effective and efficient app I've ever used. Thank you so much H&R Block.

Sucks! Tried to charge me 49.99 to use a deduction. I tried to delete the deduction 10 times because i was trying to just do a standard deduction. Keeps popping up to fix issue. I kept going around and round fix delete fix delete! Then i went to help chat. Wait time 10 minutes , ok then app timed out kicked me out of spot inline, tried again sorry problem with live chat over and over again! Finally agreed to 49.99 then during checkout extra 45 for state so free means 94.95 u suck hr block!

Easy to use with no hidden fees until the end like other tax apps, it discusses prices upfront and is completely free if you choose the right options unlike other apps that you click free and end up paying $150 when its all said and done. The app is very helpful and has answers for any question you may have on the spot instantly for you to access, plus they help you get every deduction possible. I highly reccomend this app to EVERYONE. Its definetly everything needed and more!

This was the first time I filed my taxes by myself. I was really nervous. But they made it so easy. Plus they have extra services to make sure you didn't make a mistake or to protect you if you did make a mistake for pretty cheap. I'm really glad i got this app.
Easy to use, my first filing myself and felt at ease. In some sections, I wish there were more options to file mileage and some other items. Other than that, my experience was great.

title: ICCU VideoChat
description:
ICCU VideoChat lets you securely interact with the representatives you trust. This app allows you to VideoChat and conduct business with Idaho Central Credit Union all in one, simple tool. 

While you are video chatting with an ICCU representative, you can to do the following:

·         Communicate in a personal face-to-face experience.
·         Upload documents or images requested by the representative.
·         Review contracts or agreements the representative has prepared.
·         Provide approvals on documents and terms and conditions.
·         Sign agreements and contracts.

This app is a safe, enjoyable, and effective way to communicate with your trusted ICCU representatives while you are on the move. To learn more about Idaho Central Credit Union, please visit our website: www.iccu.com 

*Data service charges may apply through your wireless carrier.

title: Bayou Federal Credit Union
description:
Manage your money when and where you want right from your mobile device with Bayou Federal Credit Union’s mobile banking app. Our app provides fast, secure and free access to your Bayou Federal accounts anytime, anywhere, even while you are on the go!

With our app you can:
•      Check your account balances
•      Review recent transactions
•      Transfer funds between your accounts
•      View and pay bills (you must be enrolled in bill pay within online banking)

You need to be enrolled in our Virtual Branch Online Banking to use this app. To enroll, visit our website http://www.bayoufcu.org/ or any location. Mobile banking is free to access, but messaging and data rates may apply.

Federally insured by the NCUA.
